pli-tv-kd6:1.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-kd6:1.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhūnaṃ sāradikena ābādhena phuṭṭhānaṃ yāgupi pītā uggacchati, bhattampi bhuttaṃ uggacchati.
pli-tv-kd6:1.1.3: Te tena kisā honti, lūkhā, dubbaṇṇā, uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajātā, dhamanisanthatagattā.
pli-tv-kd6:1.1.4: Addasā kho bhagavā te bhikkhū kise lūkhe dubbaṇṇe uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajāte dhamanisanthatagatte, disvāna āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd6:1.1.5: “kiṃ nu kho, ānanda, etarahi bhikkhū kisā, lūkhā, dubbaṇṇā, uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajātā, dhamanisanthatagattā”ti?
pli-tv-kd6:1.1.6: “Etarahi, bhante, bhikkhūnaṃ sāradikena ābādhena phuṭṭhānaṃ yāgupi pītā uggacchati, bhattampi bhuttaṃ uggacchati.
pli-tv-kd6:1.1.7: Te tena kisā honti, lūkhā, dubbaṇṇā, uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajātā, dhamanisanthatagattā”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:1.2.1: Atha kho bhagavato rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi—
pli-tv-kd6:1.2.2: “etarahi kho bhikkhūnaṃ sāradikena ābādhena phuṭṭhānaṃ yāgupi pītā uggacchati, bhattampi bhuttaṃ uggacchati.
pli-tv-kd6:1.2.3: Te tena kisā honti, lūkhā, dubbaṇṇā, uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajātā, dhamanisanthatagattā.
pli-tv-kd6:1.2.4: Kiṃ nu kho ahaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bhesajjaṃ anujāneyyaṃ, yaṃ bhesajjañceva assa bhesajjasammatañca lokassa, āhāratthañca phareyya, na ca oḷāriko āhāro paññāyeyyā”ti?
pli-tv-kd6:1.2.8: bhesajjāni ceva bhesajjasammatāni ca lokassa, āhāratthañca pharanti, na ca oḷāriko āhāro paññāyati.
pli-tv-kd6:1.2.9: Yannūnāhaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ imāni pañca bhesajjāni anujāneyyaṃ, kāle paṭiggahetvā kāle paribhuñjitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:1.3.1: Atha kho bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd6:1.3.2: “idha mayhaṃ, bhikkhave, rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi—
pli-tv-kd6:1.3.3: ‘etarahi kho bhikkhūnaṃ sāradikena ābādhena phuṭṭhānaṃ yāgupi pītā uggacchati, bhattampi bhuttaṃ uggacchati.
pli-tv-kd6:1.3.4: Te tena kisā honti, lūkhā, dubbaṇṇā, uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajātā, dhamanisanthatagattā.
pli-tv-kd6:1.3.5: Kiṃ nu kho ahaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bhesajjaṃ anujāneyyaṃ, yaṃ bhesajjañceva assa bhesajjasammatañca lokassa, āhāratthañca phareyya, na ca oḷāriko āhāro paññāyeyyā’ti.
pli-tv-kd6:1.3.9: bhesajjāni ceva bhesajjasammatāni ca lokassa, āhāratthañca pharanti, na ca oḷāriko āhāro paññāyati.
pli-tv-kd6:1.3.10: Yannūnāhaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ imāni pañca bhesajjāni anujāneyyaṃ, kāle paṭiggahetvā kāle paribhuñjitun’ti.
pli-tv-kd6:1.3.11: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tāni pañca bhesajjāni kāle paṭiggahetvā kāle paribhuñjitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:1.4.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū tāni pañca bhesajjāni kāle paṭiggahetvā kāle paribhuñjanti.
pli-tv-kd6:1.4.2: Tesaṃ yānipi tāni pākatikāni lūkhāni bhojanāni tānipi nacchādenti, pageva senesitāni.
pli-tv-kd6:1.4.3: Te tena ceva sāradikena ābādhena phuṭṭhā, iminā ca bhattācchādakena, tadubhayena bhiyyoso mattāya kisā honti, lūkhā, dubbaṇṇā, uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajātā, dhamanisanthatagattā.
pli-tv-kd6:1.4.4: Addasā kho bhagavā te bhikkhū bhiyyoso mattāya kise lūkhe dubbaṇṇe uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajāte dhamanisanthatagatte, disvāna āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd6:1.4.5: “kiṃ nu kho, ānanda, etarahi bhikkhū bhiyyoso mattāya kisā, lūkhā, dubbaṇṇā, uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajātā, dhamanisanthatagattā”ti?
pli-tv-kd6:1.5.1: “Etarahi, bhante, bhikkhū tāni ca pañca bhesajjāni kāle paṭiggahetvā kāle paribhuñjanti.
pli-tv-kd6:1.5.2: Tesaṃ yānipi tāni pākatikāni lūkhāni bhojanāni tānipi nacchādenti, pageva senesitāni.
pli-tv-kd6:1.5.3: Te tena ceva sāradikena ābādhena phuṭṭhā, iminā ca bhattācchādakena, tadubhayena bhiyyoso mattāya kisā, lūkhā, dubbaṇṇā, uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajātā, dhamanisanthatagattā”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:1.5.4: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd6:1.5.5: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tāni pañca bhesajjāni paṭiggahetvā kālepi vikālepi paribhuñjitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:2.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena gilānānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vasehi bhesajjehi attho hoti.
pli-tv-kd6:2.1.5: kāle paṭiggahitaṃ kāle nippakkaṃ kāle saṃsaṭṭhaṃ telaparibhogena paribhuñjituṃ.
pli-tv-kd6:2.2.1: Vikāle ce, bhikkhave, paṭiggahitaṃ vikāle nippakkaṃ vikāle saṃsaṭṭhaṃ, tañce paribhuñjeyya, āpatti tiṇṇaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd6:2.2.2: Kāle ce, bhikkhave, paṭiggahitaṃ vikāle nippakkaṃ vikāle saṃsaṭṭhaṃ, tañce paribhuñjeyya, āpatti dvinnaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd6:2.2.3: Kāle ce, bhikkhave, paṭiggahitaṃ kāle nippakkaṃ vikāle saṃsaṭṭhaṃ, tañce paribhuñjeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-kd6:2.2.4: Kāle ce, bhikkhave, paṭiggahitaṃ kāle nippakkaṃ kāle saṃsaṭṭhaṃ, tañce paribhuñjeyya, anāpattī”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:3.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena gilānānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ mūlehi bhesajjehi attho hoti.
pli-tv-kd6:3.1.4: haliddiṃ, siṅgiveraṃ, vacaṃ, vacattaṃ, ativisaṃ, kaṭukarohiṇiṃ, usīraṃ, bhaddamuttakaṃ, yāni vā panaññānipi atthi mūlāni bhesajjāni, neva khādanīye khādanīyatthaṃ pharanti, na bhojanīye bhojanīyatthaṃ pharanti, tāni—
pli-tv-kd6:3.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena gilānānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ mūlehi bhesajjehi piṭṭhehi attho hoti.
pli-tv-kd6:4.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena gilānānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kasāvehi bhesajjehi attho hoti.
pli-tv-kd6:4.1.4: nimbakasāvaṃ, kuṭajakasāvaṃ, paṭolakasāvaṃ, phaggavakasāvaṃ, nattamālakasāvaṃ, yāni vā panaññānipi atthi kasāvāni bhesajjāni neva khādanīye khādanīyatthaṃ pharanti, na bhojanīye bhojanīyatthaṃ pharanti, tāni—
pli-tv-kd6:5.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena gilānānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paṇṇehi bhesajjehi attho hoti.
pli-tv-kd6:5.1.4: nimbapaṇṇaṃ, kuṭajapaṇṇaṃ, paṭolapaṇṇaṃ, sulasipaṇṇaṃ, kappāsapaṇṇaṃ, yāni vā panaññānipi atthi paṇṇāni bhesajjāni, neva khādanīye khādanīyatthaṃ pharanti, na bhojanīye bhojanīyatthaṃ pharanti …
pli-tv-kd6:6.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena gilānānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phalehi bhesajjehi attho hoti.
pli-tv-kd6:6.1.4: bilaṅgaṃ, pippaliṃ, maricaṃ, harītakaṃ, vibhītakaṃ, āmalakaṃ, goṭṭhaphalaṃ, yāni vā panaññānipi atthi phalāni bhesajjāni, neva khādanīye khādanīyatthaṃ pharanti, na bhojanīye bhojanīyatthaṃ pharanti …
pli-tv-kd6:7.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena gilānānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ jatūhi bhesajjehi attho hoti.
pli-tv-kd6:7.1.4: hiṅguṃ, hiṅgujatuṃ, hiṅgusipāṭikaṃ, takaṃ, takapattiṃ, takapaṇṇiṃ, sajjulasaṃ, yāni vā panaññānipi atthi jatūni bhesajjāni, neva khādanīye khādanīyatthaṃ pharanti …
pli-tv-kd6:8.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena gilānānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ loṇehi bhesajjehi attho hoti.
pli-tv-kd6:8.1.4: sāmuddaṃ, kāḷaloṇaṃ, sindhavaṃ, ubbhidaṃ, bilaṃ, yāni vā panaññānipi atthi loṇāni bhesajjāni, neva khādanīye khādanīyatthaṃ pharanti, na bhojanīye bhojanīyatthaṃ pharanti, tāni—
pli-tv-kd6:9.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato ānandassa upajjhāyassa āyasmato belaṭṭhasīsassa thullakacchābādho hoti.
pli-tv-kd6:9.1.2: Tassa lasikāya cīvarāni kāye lagganti, tāni bhikkhū udakena temetvā temetvā apakaḍḍhanti.
pli-tv-kd6:9.1.3: Addasā kho bhagavā senāsanacārikaṃ āhiṇḍanto te bhikkhū tāni cīvarāni udakena temetvā temetvā apakaḍḍhante, disvāna yena te bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā te bhikkhū etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd6:9.1.5: “Imassa, bhante, āyasmato thullakacchābādho, lasikāya cīvarāni kāye lagganti, tāni mayaṃ udakena temetvā temetvā apakaḍḍhāmā”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:9.2.1: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd6:9.2.2: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, yassa kaṇḍu vā, piḷakā vā, assāvo vā, thullakacchu vā ābādho, kāyo vā duggandho, cuṇṇāni bhesajjāni;
pli-tv-kd6:10.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena gilānānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ cuṇṇehi bhesajjehi cālitehi attho hoti.
pli-tv-kd6:10.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno amanussikābādho hoti.
pli-tv-kd6:10.2.2: Taṃ ācariyupajjhāyā upaṭṭhahantā nāsakkhiṃsu arogaṃ kātuṃ.
pli-tv-kd6:10.2.3: So sūkarasūnaṃ gantvā āmakamaṃsaṃ khādi, āmakalohitaṃ pivi.
pli-tv-kd6:11.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno cakkhurogābādho hoti.
pli-tv-kd6:11.1.2: Taṃ bhikkhū pariggahetvā uccārampi passāvampi nikkhāmenti.
pli-tv-kd6:11.1.3: Addasā kho bhagavā senāsanacārikaṃ āhiṇḍanto te bhikkhū taṃ bhikkhuṃ pariggahetvā uccārampi passāvampi nikkhāmente, disvāna yena te bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā te bhikkhū etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd6:11.2.2: Imaṃ mayaṃ pariggahetvā uccārampi passāvampi nikkhāmemā”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:11.2.3: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd6:11.2.8: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, candanaṃ, tagaraṃ, kāḷānusāriyaṃ, tālīsaṃ, bhaddamuttakan”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:12.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū piṭṭhāni añjanāni carukesupi sarāvakesupi nikkhipanti;
pli-tv-kd6:12.1.5: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū uccāvacā añjaniyo dhārenti—
pli-tv-kd6:12.1.12: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, aṭṭhimayaṃ, dantamayaṃ, visāṇamayaṃ, naḷamayaṃ, veḷumayaṃ, kaṭṭhamayaṃ, jatumayaṃ, phalamayaṃ, lohamayaṃ, saṅkhanābhimayan”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:12.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena añjaniyo apārutā honti, tiṇacuṇṇehipi paṃsukehipi okiriyanti.
pli-tv-kd6:12.3.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū aṅguliyā añjanti, akkhīni dukkhāni honti.
pli-tv-kd6:12.3.4: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū uccāvacā añjanisalākāyo dhārenti—
pli-tv-kd6:12.4.1: Tena kho pana samayena añjanisalākā bhūmiyaṃ patitā pharusā hoti.
pli-tv-kd6:12.4.4: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū añjanimpi añjanisalākampi hatthena pariharanti.
pli-tv-kd6:13.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato pilindavacchassa sīsābhitāpo hoti.
pli-tv-kd6:13.1.10: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū uccāvacā natthukaraṇiyo dhārenti—
pli-tv-kd6:13.2.7: Taññeva vaṭṭiṃ ālimpetvā pivanti, kaṇṭho dahati.
pli-tv-kd6:13.2.10: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū uccāvacāni dhūmanettāni dhārenti—
pli-tv-kd6:13.2.18: Tena kho pana samayena dhūmanettāni apārutāni honti, pāṇakā pavisanti.
pli-tv-kd6:13.2.21: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū dhūmanettāni hatthena pariharanti.
pli-tv-kd6:14.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato pilindavacchassa vātābādho hoti.
pli-tv-kd6:14.1.6: Tasmiṃ kho pana telapāke majjaṃ pakkhipitabbaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-kd6:14.1.9: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū atipakkhittamajjāni telāni pacanti, tāni pivitvā majjanti.
pli-tv-kd6:14.1.13: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, yasmiṃ telapāke majjassa na vaṇṇo na gandho na raso paññāyati, evarūpaṃ majjapakkhittaṃ telaṃ pātun”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:14.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhūnaṃ bahuṃ atipakkhittamajjaṃ telaṃ pakkaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-kd6:14.2.2: Atha kho bhikkhūnaṃ etadahosi—“kathaṃ nu kho atipakkhittamajje tele paṭipajjitabban”ti?
pli-tv-kd6:14.2.5: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato pilindavacchassa bahutaraṃ telaṃ pakkaṃ hoti, telabhājanaṃ na vijjati.
pli-tv-kd6:14.3.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato pilindavacchassa aṅgavāto hoti.
pli-tv-kd6:14.4.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato pilindavacchassa pabbavāto hoti.
pli-tv-kd6:14.4.7: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato pilindavacchassa pādā phalitā honti.
pli-tv-kd6:14.4.13: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno gaṇḍābādho hoti.
pli-tv-kd6:14.6.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu ahinā daṭṭho hoti.
pli-tv-kd6:14.6.8: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, sati kappiyakārake paṭiggahāpetuṃ, asati kappiyakārake sāmaṃ gahetvā paribhuñjitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:14.6.9: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarena bhikkhunā visaṃ pītaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-kd6:14.6.15: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, yaṃ karonto paṭiggaṇhāti, sveva paṭiggaho kato, na puna paṭiggahetabbo”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:14.7.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno gharadinnakābādho hoti.
pli-tv-kd6:14.7.4: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu duṭṭhagahaṇiko hoti.
pli-tv-kd6:14.7.7: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno paṇḍurogābādho hoti.
pli-tv-kd6:14.7.10: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno chavidosābādho hoti.
pli-tv-kd6:14.7.13: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu abhisannakāyo hoti.
pli-tv-kd6:15.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā pilindavaccho rājagahe pabbhāraṃ sodhāpeti leṇaṃ kattukāmo.
pli-tv-kd6:15.1.2: Atha kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro yenāyasmā pilindavaccho tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ pilindavacchaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd6:15.1.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro āyasmantaṃ pilindavacchaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd6:15.1.8: “Tena hi, bhante, bhagavantaṃ paṭipucchitvā mama āroceyyāthā”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:15.1.9: “Evaṃ, mahārājā”ti kho āyasmā pilindavaccho rañño māgadhassa seniyassa bimbisārassa paccassosi.
pli-tv-kd6:15.2.1: Atha kho āyasmā pilindavaccho rājānaṃ māgadhaṃ seniyaṃ bimbisāraṃ dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi, samādapesi, samuttejesi, sampahaṃsesi.
pli-tv-kd6:15.2.2: Atha kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro āyasmatā pilindavacchena dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito samuttejito sampahaṃsito uṭṭhāyāsanā āyasmantaṃ pilindavacchaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd6:15.2.3: Atha kho āyasmā pilindavaccho bhagavato santike dūtaṃ pāhesi—
pli-tv-kd6:15.2.4: “rājā, bhante, māgadho seniyo bimbisāro ārāmikaṃ dātukāmo.
pli-tv-kd6:15.2.5: Kathaṃ nu kho, bhante, mayā paṭipajjitabban”ti?
pli-tv-kd6:15.2.6: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd6:15.3.1: Dutiyampi kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro yenāyasmā pilindavaccho tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ pilindavacchaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd6:15.3.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro āyasmantaṃ pilindavacchaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd6:15.3.6: Atha kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro āyasmato pilindavacchassa ārāmikaṃ paṭissutvā, vissaritvā, cirena satiṃ paṭilabhitvā, aññataraṃ sabbatthakaṃ mahāmattaṃ āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd6:15.3.7: “yo mayā, bhaṇe, ayyassa ārāmiko paṭissuto, dinno so ārāmiko”ti?
pli-tv-kd6:15.3.9: “Kīva ciraṃ nu kho, bhaṇe, ito hi taṃ hotī”ti?
pli-tv-kd6:15.4.1: Atha kho so mahāmatto rattiyo gaṇetvā rājānaṃ māgadhaṃ seniyaṃ bimbisāraṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd6:15.4.3: “Tena hi, bhaṇe, ayyassa pañca ārāmikasatāni dehī”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:15.4.5: kho so mahāmatto rañño māgadhassa seniyassa bimbisārassa paṭissutvā āyasmato pilindavacchassa pañca ārāmikasatāni pādāsi, pāṭiyekko gāmo nivisi.
pli-tv-kd6:15.4.7: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā pilindavaccho tasmiṃ gāmake kulūpako hoti.
pli-tv-kd6:15.4.8: Atha kho āyasmā pilindavaccho pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya pilindagāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
pli-tv-kd6:15.5.1: Tena kho pana samayena tasmiṃ gāmake ussavo hoti.
pli-tv-kd6:15.5.3: Atha kho āyasmā pilindavaccho pilindagāmake sapadānaṃ piṇḍāya caramāno yena aññatarassa ārāmikassa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd6:15.5.4: Tena kho pana samayena tassā ārāmikiniyā dhītā aññe dārake alaṅkate mālākite passitvā rodati—
pli-tv-kd6:15.5.6: Atha kho āyasmā pilindavaccho taṃ ārāmikiniṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd6:15.5.8: “Ayaṃ, bhante, dārikā aññe dārake alaṅkate mālākite passitvā rodati—
pli-tv-kd6:15.5.10: Kuto amhākaṃ duggatānaṃ mālā, kuto alaṅkāro”ti?
pli-tv-kd6:15.6.1: Atha kho āyasmā pilindavaccho aññataraṃ tiṇaṇḍupakaṃ gahetvā taṃ ārāmikiniṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd6:15.6.3: Atha kho sā ārāmikinī taṃ tiṇaṇḍupakaṃ gahetvā tassā dārikāya sīse paṭimuñci.
pli-tv-kd6:15.6.4: Sā ahosi suvaṇṇamālā abhirūpā, dassanīyā, pāsādikā;
pli-tv-kd6:15.6.6: Manussā rañño māgadhassa seniyassa bimbisārassa ārocesuṃ—
pli-tv-kd6:15.6.7: “amukassa, deva, ārāmikassa ghare suvaṇṇamālā abhirūpā, dassanīyā, pāsādikā;
pli-tv-kd6:15.6.11: Atha kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro taṃ ārāmikakulaṃ bandhāpesi.
pli-tv-kd6:15.7.1: Dutiyampi kho āyasmā pilindavaccho pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya pilindagāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
pli-tv-kd6:15.7.2: Pilindagāmake sapadānaṃ piṇḍāya caramāno yena tassa ārāmikassa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā paṭivissake pucchi—
pli-tv-kd6:15.7.5: Atha kho āyasmā pilindavaccho yena rañño māgadhassa seniyassa bimbisārassa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd6:15.7.6: Atha kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro yenāyasmā pilindavaccho tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ pilindavacchaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd6:15.7.7: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho rājānaṃ māgadhaṃ seniyaṃ bimbisāraṃ āyasmā pilindavaccho etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd6:15.8.2: “Tassa, bhante, ārāmikassa ghare suvaṇṇamālā abhirūpā, dassanīyā, pāsādikā;
pli-tv-kd6:15.8.6: Atha kho āyasmā pilindavaccho rañño māgadhassa seniyassa bimbisārassa pāsādaṃ suvaṇṇanti adhimucci;
pli-tv-kd6:15.8.8: “Idaṃ pana te, mahārāja, tāva bahuṃ suvaṇṇaṃ kuto”ti?
pli-tv-kd6:15.8.9: “Aññātaṃ, bhante, ayyasseveso iddhānubhāvo”ti taṃ ārāmikakulaṃ muñcāpesi.
pli-tv-kd6:15.9.2: “ayyena kira pilindavacchena sarājikāya parisāya uttari manussadhammaṃ iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ dassitan”ti—
pli-tv-kd6:15.9.3: attamanā abhippasannā āyasmato pilindavacchassa pañca bhesajjāni abhihariṃsu, seyyathidaṃ—
pli-tv-kd6:15.9.5: Pakatiyāpi ca āyasmā pilindavaccho lābhī hoti pañcannaṃ bhesajjānaṃ;
pli-tv-kd6:15.9.8: laddhaṃ laddhaṃ kolambepi, ghaṭepi, pūretvā paṭisāmeti;
pli-tv-kd6:15.9.12: Manussā vihāracārikaṃ āhiṇḍantā passitvā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd6:15.9.13: “antokoṭṭhāgārikā ime samaṇā sakyaputtiyā, seyyathāpi rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:15.10.1: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd6:15.10.2: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā, te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd6:15.10.4: Atha kho te bhikkhū te anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ …pe…
pli-tv-kd6:15.10.5: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhū evarūpāya bāhullāya cetentī”ti?
pli-tv-kd6:15.10.7: vigarahitvā dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd6:15.10.8: “yāni kho pana tāni gilānānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paṭisāyanīyāni bhesajjāni, seyyathidaṃ—sappi, navanītaṃ, telaṃ, madhu, phāṇitaṃ, tāni paṭiggahetvā sattāhaparamaṃ sannidhikārakaṃ paribhuñjitabbāni. Taṃ atikkāmayato yathādhammo kāretabbo”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:16.1.1: Atha kho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā yena rājagahaṃ tena cārikaṃ pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd6:16.1.2: Addasā kho āyasmā kaṅkhārevato antarāmagge guḷakaraṇaṃ, okkamitvā guḷe piṭṭhampi chārikampi pakkhipante, disvāna—
pli-tv-kd6:16.1.3: “akappiyo guḷo sāmiso, na kappati guḷo vikāle paribhuñjitun”ti—
pli-tv-kd6:16.1.5: Yepissa sotabbaṃ maññanti, tepi guḷaṃ na paribhuñjanti.
pli-tv-kd6:16.1.9: “Sace, bhikkhave, thaddhatthāya guḷe piṭṭhampi chārikampi pakkhipanti, so ca guḷotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
pli-tv-kd6:16.2.1: Addasā kho āyasmā kaṅkhārevato antarāmagge vacce muggaṃ jātaṃ, passitvā—
pli-tv-kd6:16.2.5: Yepissa sotabbaṃ maññanti, tepi muggaṃ na paribhuñjanti.
pli-tv-kd6:16.2.7: “Sace, bhikkhave, pakkāpi muggā jāyanti, anujānāmi, bhikkhave, yathāsukhaṃ muggaṃ paribhuñjitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:16.3.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno udaravātābādho hoti.
pli-tv-kd6:17.1.1: Atha kho bhagavā anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno yena rājagahaṃ tadavasari. Tatra sudaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
pli-tv-kd6:17.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavato udaravātābādho hoti.
pli-tv-kd6:17.1.3: Atha kho āyasmā ānando—“pubbepi bhagavato udaravātābādho tekaṭulayāguyā phāsu hotī”ti—
pli-tv-kd6:17.1.4: sāmaṃ tilampi, taṇḍulampi, muggampi viññāpetvā, anto vāsetvā, anto sāmaṃ pacitvā bhagavato upanāmesi—
pli-tv-kd6:17.2.1: Jānantāpi tathāgatā pucchanti, jānantāpi na pucchanti;
pli-tv-kd6:17.2.2: kālaṃ viditvā pucchanti, kālaṃ viditvā na pucchanti;
pli-tv-kd6:17.2.5: Dvīhi ākārehi buddhā bhagavanto bhikkhū paṭipucchanti— “dhammaṃ vā desessāma, sāvakānaṃ vā sikkhāpadaṃ paññapessāmā”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:17.2.6: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantesi—“kutāyaṃ, ānanda, yāgū”ti?
pli-tv-kd6:17.2.7: Atha kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd6:17.3.2: “ananucchavikaṃ, ānanda, ananulomikaṃ, appatirūpaṃ, assāmaṇakaṃ, akappiyaṃ, akaraṇīyaṃ.
pli-tv-kd6:17.3.3: Kathañhi nāma tvaṃ, ānanda, evarūpāya bāhullāya cetessasi.
pli-tv-kd6:17.3.4: Yadapi, ānanda, anto vuṭṭhaṃ tadapi akappiyaṃ;
pli-tv-kd6:17.3.8: vigarahitvā dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd6:17.3.9: “na, bhikkhave, anto vuṭṭhaṃ, anto pakkaṃ, sāmaṃ pakkaṃ paribhuñjitabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd6:17.4.1: Anto ce, bhikkhave, vuṭṭhaṃ, anto pakkaṃ, sāmaṃ pakkaṃ tañce paribhuñjeyya, āpatti tiṇṇaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd6:17.4.2: Anto ce, bhikkhave, vuṭṭhaṃ, anto pakkaṃ, aññehi pakkaṃ, tañce paribhuñjeyya, āpatti dvinnaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd6:17.4.3: Anto ce, bhikkhave, vuṭṭhaṃ, bahi pakkaṃ, sāmaṃ pakkaṃ, tañce paribhuñjeyya, āpatti dvinnaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd6:17.5.1: Bahi ce, bhikkhave, vuṭṭhaṃ, anto pakkaṃ, sāmaṃ pakkaṃ, tañce paribhuñjeyya, āpatti dvinnaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd6:17.5.2: Anto ce, bhikkhave, vuṭṭhaṃ, bahi pakkaṃ, aññehi pakkaṃ, tañce paribhuñjeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-kd6:17.5.3: Bahi ce, bhikkhave, vuṭṭhaṃ, anto pakkaṃ, aññehi pakkaṃ, tañce paribhuñjeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-kd6:17.5.4: Bahi ce, bhikkhave, vuṭṭhaṃ, bahi pakkaṃ, sāmaṃ pakkaṃ, tañce paribhuñjeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-kd6:17.5.5: Bahi ce, bhikkhave, vuṭṭhaṃ, bahi pakkaṃ, aññehi pakkaṃ, tañce paribhuñjeyya, anāpattī”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:17.7.1: Tena kho pana samayena rājagahaṃ dubbhikkhaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-kd6:17.7.2: Manussā loṇampi, telampi, taṇḍulampi, khādanīyampi ārāmaṃ āharanti.
pli-tv-kd6:17.7.12: Dubbhikkhe kappiyakārakā bahutaraṃ haranti, appataraṃ bhikkhūnaṃ denti.
pli-tv-kd6:17.7.15: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, anto vuṭṭhaṃ, anto pakkaṃ, sāmaṃ pakkan”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:17.8.1: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū kāsīsu vassaṃvuṭṭhā rājagahaṃ gacchantā bhagavantaṃ dassanāya antarāmagge na labhiṃsu lūkhassa vā paṇītassa vā bhojanassa yāvadatthaṃ pāripūriṃ;
pli-tv-kd6:17.8.4: Atha kho te bhikkhū kilantarūpā yena rājagahaṃ veḷuvanaṃ kalandakanivāpo, yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
pli-tv-kd6:17.8.5: Āciṇṇaṃ kho panetaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ āgantukehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ paṭisammodituṃ.
pli-tv-kd6:17.8.6: Atha kho bhagavā te bhikkhū etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd6:17.9.2: Idha mayaṃ, bhante, kāsīsu vassaṃvuṭṭhā rājagahaṃ āgacchantā bhagavantaṃ dassanāya antarāmagge na labhimhā lūkhassa vā paṇītassa vā bhojanassa yāvadatthaṃ pāripūriṃ;
pli-tv-kd6:17.9.6: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd6:17.9.7: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, yattha phalakhādanīyaṃ passati, kappiyakārako ca na hoti, sāmaṃ gahetvā, haritvā, kappiyakārake passitvā, bhūmiyaṃ nikkhipitvā, paṭiggahāpetvā paribhuñjituṃ.
pli-tv-kd6:18.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa navā ca tilā navañca madhu uppannā honti.
pli-tv-kd6:18.1.3: “yannūnāhaṃ nave ca tile navañca madhuṃ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṃghassa dadeyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:18.1.4: Atha kho so brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṃ paṭisammodi, sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
pli-tv-kd6:18.1.5: Ekamantaṃ ṭhito kho so brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd6:18.1.6: “adhivāsetu me bhavaṃ gotamo svātanāya bhattaṃ, saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṃghenā”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:18.1.8: Atha kho so brāhmaṇo bhagavato adhivāsanaṃ viditvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd6:18.2.1: Atha kho so brāhmaṇo tassā rattiyā accayena paṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ paṭiyādāpetvā bhagavato kālaṃ ārocāpesi—
pli-tv-kd6:18.2.3: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena tassa brāhmaṇassa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi, saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṃghena.
pli-tv-kd6:18.2.4: Atha kho so brāhmaṇo buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṃghaṃ paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappetvā sampavāretvā bhagavantaṃ bhuttāviṃ onītapattapāṇiṃ ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd6:18.2.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ bhagavā dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā, samādapetvā, samuttejetvā, sampahaṃsetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd6:18.3.1: Atha kho tassa brāhmaṇassa acirapakkantassa bhagavato etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd6:18.3.2: “yesaṃ kho mayā atthāya buddhappamukho bhikkhusaṃgho nimantito, ‘nave ca tile navañca madhuṃ dassāmī’ti, te mayā pamuṭṭhā dātuṃ.
pli-tv-kd6:18.3.3: Yannūnāhaṃ nave ca tile navañca madhuṃ kolambehi ca ghaṭehi ca ārāmaṃ harāpeyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:18.3.4: Atha kho so brāhmaṇo nave ca tile navañca madhuṃ kolambehi ca ghaṭehi ca ārāmaṃ harāpetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
pli-tv-kd6:18.3.5: Ekamantaṃ ṭhito kho so brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd6:18.4.1: “yesaṃ kho mayā, bho gotama, atthāya buddhappamukho bhikkhusaṃgho nimantito, ‘nave ca tile navañca madhuṃ dassāmī’ti, te mayā pamuṭṭhā dātuṃ.
pli-tv-kd6:18.4.2: Paṭiggaṇhātu me bhavaṃ gotamo nave ca tile navañca madhun”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:18.4.4: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū dubbhikkhe appamattakepi pavārenti, paṭisaṅkhāpi paṭikkhipanti,
pli-tv-kd6:18.4.5: sabbo ca saṃgho pavārito hoti. Bhikkhū kukkuccāyantā na paṭiggaṇhanti.
pli-tv-kd6:18.4.7: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tato nīhaṭaṃ bhuttāvinā pavāritena anatirittaṃ paribhuñjitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:19.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato upanandassa sakyaputtassa upaṭṭhākakulaṃ saṃghassatthāya khādanīyaṃ pāhesi—
pli-tv-kd6:19.1.3: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā upanando sakyaputto gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭho hoti.
pli-tv-kd6:19.1.4: Atha kho te manussā ārāmaṃ gantvā bhikkhū pucchiṃsu—
pli-tv-kd6:19.1.6: “Esāvuso, āyasmā upanando sakyaputto gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭho”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:19.1.7: “Idaṃ, bhante, khādanīyaṃ ayyassa upanandassa dassetvā saṃghassa dātabban”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:19.1.9: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, paṭiggahetvā nikkhipatha yāva upanando āgacchatī”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:19.2.1: Atha kho āyasmā upanando sakyaputto purebhattaṃ kulāni payirupāsitvā divā āgacchati.
pli-tv-kd6:19.2.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū dubbhikkhe appamattakepi pavārenti, paṭisaṅkhāpi paṭikkhipanti, sabbo ca saṃgho pavārito hoti.
pli-tv-kd6:19.2.5: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ bhuttāvinā pavāritena anatirittaṃ paribhuñjitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:20.1.1: Atha kho bhagavā rājagahe yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā yena sāvatthi tena cārikaṃ pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd6:20.1.2: Anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno yena sāvatthi tadavasari.
pli-tv-kd6:20.1.3: Tatra sudaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-kd6:20.1.4: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato sāriputtassa kāyaḍāhābādho hoti.
pli-tv-kd6:20.1.5: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd6:20.1.6: “pubbe te, āvuso sāriputta, kāyaḍāhābādho kena phāsu hotī”ti?
pli-tv-kd6:20.1.8: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya, pasāritaṃ vā bāhaṃ samiñjeyya; evameva jetavane antarahito mandākiniyā pokkharaṇiyā tīre pāturahosi.
pli-tv-kd6:20.2.1: Addasā kho aññataro nāgo āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ, disvāna āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd6:20.2.2: “etu kho, bhante, ayyo mahāmoggallāno. Svāgataṃ, bhante, ayyassa mahāmoggallānassa.
pli-tv-kd6:20.2.5: “Bhisehi ca me, āvuso, attho, muḷālikāhi cā”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:20.2.6: Atha kho so nāgo aññataraṃ nāgaṃ āṇāpesi—
pli-tv-kd6:20.2.7: “tena hi, bhaṇe, ayyassa bhise ca muḷālikāyo ca yāvadatthaṃ dehī”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:20.2.8: Atha kho so nāgo mandākiniṃ pokkharaṇiṃ ogāhetvā, soṇḍāya bhisañca muḷālikañca abbāhitvā, suvikkhālitaṃ vikkhāletvā, bhaṇḍikaṃ bandhitvā yenāyasmā mahāmoggallāno tenupasaṅkami.
pli-tv-kd6:20.3.1: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno—seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya, pasāritaṃ vā bāhaṃ samiñjeyya; evameva—mandākiniyā pokkharaṇiyā tīre antarahito jetavane pāturahosi.
pli-tv-kd6:20.3.2: Sopi kho nāgo mandākiniyā pokkharaṇiyā tīre antarahito jetavane pāturahosi.
pli-tv-kd6:20.3.3: Atha kho so nāgo āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa bhise ca muḷālikāyo ca paṭiggahāpetvā jetavane antarahito mandākiniyā pokkharaṇiyā tīre pāturahosi.
pli-tv-kd6:20.3.4: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno āyasmato sāriputtassa bhise ca muḷālikāyo ca upanāmesi.
pli-tv-kd6:20.3.5: Atha kho āyasmato sāriputtassa bhise ca muḷālikāyo ca bhuttassa kāyaḍāhābādho paṭippassambhi.
pli-tv-kd6:20.3.6: Bahū bhisā ca muḷālikāyo ca avasiṭṭhā honti.
pli-tv-kd6:20.4.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū dubbhikkhe appamattakepi pavārenti, paṭisaṅkhāpi paṭikkhipanti, sabbo ca saṃgho pavārito hoti.
pli-tv-kd6:20.4.4: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, vanaṭṭhaṃ pokkharaṭṭhaṃ bhuttāvinā pavāritena anatirittaṃ paribhuñjitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:21.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena sāvatthiyaṃ bahuṃ phalakhādanīyaṃ uppannaṃ hoti, kappiyakārako ca na hoti.
pli-tv-kd6:21.1.4: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, abījaṃ nibbattabījaṃ akatakappaṃ phalaṃ paribhuñjitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:22.1.1: Atha kho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā yena rājagahaṃ tena cārikaṃ pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd6:22.1.2: Anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno yena rājagahaṃ tadavasari.
pli-tv-kd6:22.1.3: Tatra sudaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
pli-tv-kd6:22.1.4: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno bhagandalābādho hoti.
pli-tv-kd6:22.1.6: Atha kho bhagavā senāsanacārikaṃ āhiṇḍanto yena tassa bhikkhuno vihāro tenupasaṅkami.
pli-tv-kd6:22.2.1: Addasā kho ākāsagotto vejjo bhagavantaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ, disvāna bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd6:22.2.2: “āgacchatu bhavaṃ gotamo, imassa bhikkhuno vaccamaggaṃ passatu, seyyathāpi godhāmukhan”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:22.2.5: tatova paṭinivattitvā, etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṃghaṃ sannipātāpetvā, bhikkhū paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-kd6:22.2.6: “atthi kira, bhikkhave, amukasmiṃ vihāre bhikkhu gilāno”ti?
pli-tv-kd6:22.2.9: “Tassa, bhante, āyasmato bhagandalābādho, ākāsagotto vejjo satthakammaṃ karotī”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:22.3.2: “ananucchavikaṃ, bhikkhave, tassa moghapurisassa, ananulomikaṃ, appatirūpaṃ, assāmaṇakaṃ, akappiyaṃ, akaraṇīyaṃ.
pli-tv-kd6:22.3.3: Kathañhi nāma so, bhikkhave, moghapuriso sambādhe satthakammaṃ kārāpessati.
pli-tv-kd6:22.3.4: Sambādhe, bhikkhave, sukhumā chavi, duropayo vaṇo, dupparihāraṃ satthaṃ.
pli-tv-kd6:22.4.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū—
pli-tv-kd6:22.4.4: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā, te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd6:22.4.6: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-kd6:22.4.7: “Saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhū vatthikammaṃ kārāpentī”ti?
pli-tv-kd6:22.4.9: vigarahitvā dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd6:22.4.10: “na, bhikkhave, sambādhassa sāmantā dvaṅgulā satthakammaṃ vā vatthikammaṃ vā kārāpetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd6:23.1.1: Atha kho bhagavā rājagahe yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā yena bārāṇasī tena cārikaṃ pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd6:23.1.2: Anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno yena bārāṇasī tadavasari.
pli-tv-kd6:23.1.3: Tatra sudaṃ bhagavā bārāṇasiyaṃ viharati isipatane migadāye.
pli-tv-kd6:23.1.4: Tena kho pana samayena bārāṇasiyaṃ suppiyo ca upāsako suppiyā ca upāsikā ubhatopasannā honti, dāyakā, kārakā, saṃghupaṭṭhākā.
pli-tv-kd6:23.1.5: Atha kho suppiyā upāsikā ārāmaṃ gantvā vihārena vihāraṃ pariveṇena pariveṇaṃ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhū pucchati—
pli-tv-kd6:23.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarena bhikkhunā virecanaṃ pītaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-kd6:23.2.2: Atha kho so bhikkhu suppiyaṃ upāsikaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd6:23.2.8: “Evaṃ, ayye”ti kho so puriso suppiyāya upāsikāya paṭissuṇitvā kevalakappaṃ bārāṇasiṃ āhiṇḍanto na addasa pavattamaṃsaṃ.
pli-tv-kd6:23.2.9: Atha kho so puriso yena suppiyā upāsikā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā suppiyaṃ upāsikaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd6:23.3.2: “tassa kho gilānassa bhikkhuno paṭicchādanīyaṃ alabhantassa ābādho vā abhivaḍḍhissati, kālaṃkiriyā vā bhavissati.
pli-tv-kd6:23.3.3: Na kho metaṃ patirūpaṃ yāhaṃ paṭissuṇitvā na harāpeyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:23.3.4: Potthanikaṃ gahetvā ūrumaṃsaṃ ukkantitvā dāsiyā adāsi—
pli-tv-kd6:23.3.5: “handa, je, imaṃ maṃsaṃ sampādetvā amukasmiṃ vihāre bhikkhu gilāno, tassa dajjāhi.
pli-tv-kd6:23.3.6: Yo ca maṃ pucchati, ‘gilānā’ti paṭivedehī”ti uttarāsaṅgena ūruṃ veṭhetvā ovarakaṃ pavisitvā mañcake nipajji.
pli-tv-kd6:23.4.1: Atha kho suppiyo upāsako gharaṃ gantvā dāsiṃ pucchi—
pli-tv-kd6:23.4.4: Atha kho suppiyo upāsako yena suppiyā upāsikā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā suppiyaṃ upāsikaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd6:23.4.8: Atha kho suppiyā upāsikā suppiyassa upāsakassa etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd6:23.4.11: Yāva saddhāyaṃ suppiyā pasannā, yatra hi nāma attanopi maṃsāni pariccattāni.
pli-tv-kd6:23.4.13: haṭṭho udaggo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd6:23.5.1: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho suppiyo upāsako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd6:23.5.2: “adhivāsetu me, bhante, bhagavā svātanāya bhattaṃ, saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṃghenā”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:23.5.4: Atha kho suppiyo upāsako bhagavato adhivāsanaṃ viditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd6:23.5.5: Atha kho suppiyo upāsako tassā rattiyā accayena paṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ paṭiyādāpetvā bhagavato kālaṃ ārocāpesi—“kālo, bhante, niṭṭhitaṃ bhattan”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:23.5.6: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena suppiyassa upāsakassa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi, saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṃghena.
pli-tv-kd6:23.6.1: Atha kho suppiyo upāsako yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
pli-tv-kd6:23.6.2: Ekamantaṃ ṭhitaṃ kho suppiyaṃ upāsakaṃ bhagavā etadavoca—“kahaṃ, suppiyā”ti?
pli-tv-kd6:23.6.7: Atha kho suppiyo upāsako suppiyaṃ upāsikaṃ pariggahetvā ānesi.
pli-tv-kd6:23.6.8: Tassā saha dassanena bhagavato tāva mahāvaṇo ruḷho ahosi succhavilomajāto.
pli-tv-kd6:23.7.1: Atha kho suppiyo ca upāsako suppiyā ca upāsikā—
pli-tv-kd6:23.7.3: Tathāgatassa mahiddhikatā mahānubhāvatā, yatra hi nāma saha dassanena bhagavato tāva mahāvaṇo ruḷho bhavissati succhavilomajāto”ti—
pli-tv-kd6:23.7.4: haṭṭhā udaggā buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṃghaṃ paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappetvā sampavāretvā bhagavantaṃ bhuttāviṃ onītapattapāṇiṃ ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
pli-tv-kd6:23.7.5: Atha kho bhagavā suppiyañca upāsakaṃ suppiyañca upāsikaṃ dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṃsetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd6:23.8.1: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṃghaṃ sannipātāpetvā bhikkhū paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-kd6:23.8.3: Evaṃ vutte, so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—“ahaṃ kho, bhante, suppiyaṃ upāsikaṃ maṃsaṃ viññāpesin”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:23.9.2: kathañhi nāma tvaṃ, moghapurisa, appaṭivekkhitvā maṃsaṃ paribhuñjissasi.
pli-tv-kd6:23.9.5: vigarahitvā dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd6:23.9.6: “santi, bhikkhave, manussā saddhā pasannā, tehi attanopi maṃsāni pariccattāni.
pli-tv-kd6:23.9.9: Na ca, bhikkhave, appaṭivekkhitvā maṃsaṃ paribhuñjitabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd6:23.10.1: Tena kho pana samayena rañño hatthī maranti.
pli-tv-kd6:23.10.2: Manussā dubbhikkhe hatthimaṃsaṃ paribhuñjanti, bhikkhūnaṃ piṇḍāya carantānaṃ hatthimaṃsaṃ denti.
pli-tv-kd6:23.10.6: Rājaṅgaṃ hatthī, sace rājā jāneyya, na nesaṃ attamano assā”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:23.11.1: Tena kho pana samayena rañño assā maranti.
pli-tv-kd6:23.11.2: Manussā dubbhikkhe assamaṃsaṃ paribhuñjanti, bhikkhūnaṃ piṇḍāya carantānaṃ assamaṃsaṃ denti.
pli-tv-kd6:23.11.6: Rājaṅgaṃ assā, sace rājā jāneyya, na nesaṃ attamano assā”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:23.12.1: Tena kho pana samayena manussā dubbhikkhe sunakhamaṃsaṃ paribhuñjanti, bhikkhūnaṃ piṇḍāya carantānaṃ sunakhamaṃsaṃ denti.
pli-tv-kd6:23.12.4: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā sunakhamaṃsaṃ paribhuñjissanti, jeguccho sunakho paṭikūlo”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:23.13.1: Tena kho pana samayena manussā dubbhikkhe ahimaṃsaṃ paribhuñjanti, bhikkhūnaṃ piṇḍāya carantānaṃ ahimaṃsaṃ denti.
pli-tv-kd6:23.13.4: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā ahimaṃsaṃ paribhuñjissanti, jeguccho ahi paṭikūlo”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:23.13.5: Supassopi nāgarājā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
pli-tv-kd6:23.13.6: Ekamantaṃ ṭhito kho supasso nāgarājā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd6:23.13.9: Sādhu, bhante, ayyā ahimaṃsaṃ na paribhuñjeyyun”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:23.13.10: Atha kho bhagavā supassaṃ nāgarājānaṃ dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi …pe… padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd6:23.13.11: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd6:23.14.1: Tena kho pana samayena luddakā sīhaṃ hantvā sīhamaṃsaṃ paribhuñjanti, bhikkhūnaṃ piṇḍāya carantānaṃ sīhamaṃsaṃ denti.
pli-tv-kd6:23.15.1: Tena kho pana samayena luddakā byagghaṃ hantvā …pe…
pli-tv-kd6:23.15.4: taracchaṃ hantvā taracchamaṃsaṃ paribhuñjanti, bhikkhūnaṃ piṇḍāya carantānaṃ taracchamaṃsaṃ denti.
pli-tv-kd6:24.1.1: Atha kho bhagavā bārāṇasiyaṃ yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā yena andhakavindaṃ tena cārikaṃ pakkāmi, mahatā bhikkhusaṃghena saddhiṃ, aḍḍhatelasehi bhikkhusatehi.
pli-tv-kd6:24.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena jānapadā manussā bahuṃ loṇampi, telampi, taṇḍulampi, khādanīyampi sakaṭesu āropetvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṃghassa piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhā honti—
pli-tv-kd6:24.1.3: “yadā paṭipāṭiṃ labhissāma tadā bhattaṃ karissāmā”ti, pañcamattāni ca vighāsādasatāni.
pli-tv-kd6:24.1.4: Atha kho bhagavā anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno yena andhakavindaṃ tadavasari.
pli-tv-kd6:24.2.1: Atha kho aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa paṭipāṭiṃ alabhantassa etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd6:24.2.2: “atītāni kho me dve māsāni buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṃghaṃ anubandhantassa ‘yadā paṭipāṭiṃ labhissāmi tadā bhattaṃ karissāmī’ti, na ca me paṭipāṭi labbhati, ahañcamhi ekattako, bahu ca me gharāvāsattho hāyati.
pli-tv-kd6:24.2.5: Atha kho so brāhmaṇo bhattaggaṃ olokento dve nāddasa—
pli-tv-kd6:24.3.1: Atha kho so brāhmaṇo yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd6:24.3.2: “idha me, bho ānanda, paṭipāṭiṃ alabhantassa etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd6:24.3.3: ‘atītāni kho me dve māsāni buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṃghaṃ anubandhantassa, “yadā paṭipāṭiṃ labhissāmi tadā bhattaṃ karissāmī”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:24.3.4: Na ca me paṭipāṭi labbhati, ahañcamhi ekattako, bahu ca me gharāvāsattho hāyati.
pli-tv-kd6:24.3.7: So kho ahaṃ, bho ānanda, bhattaggaṃ olokento dve nāddasaṃ—
pli-tv-kd6:24.3.9: Sacāhaṃ, bho ānanda, paṭiyādeyyaṃ yāguñca madhugoḷakañca, paṭiggaṇheyya me bhavaṃ gotamo”ti?
pli-tv-kd6:24.4.1: Atha kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd6:24.4.4: Atha kho so brāhmaṇo tassā rattiyā accayena pahūtaṃ yāguñca madhugoḷakañca paṭiyādāpetvā bhagavato upanāmesi—
pli-tv-kd6:24.4.9: Atha kho so brāhmaṇo buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṃghaṃ pahūtāya yāguyā ca madhugoḷakena ca sahatthā santappetvā sampavāretvā bhagavantaṃ dhotahatthaṃ onītapattapāṇiṃ ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd6:24.5.1: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ bhagavā etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd6:24.6.3: Yāguṃ dento āyuṃ deti, vaṇṇaṃ deti, sukhaṃ deti, balaṃ deti, paṭibhānaṃ deti, yāgu pītā khuddaṃ paṭihanati, pipāsaṃ vineti, vātaṃ anulometi, vatthiṃ sodheti, āmāvasesaṃ pāceti—
pli-tv-kd6:24.7.1: Atha kho bhagavā taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ imāhi gāthāhi anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd6:24.7.2: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd6:25.1.1: Assosuṃ kho manussā bhagavatā kira yāgu anuññātā madhugoḷakañcāti.
pli-tv-kd6:25.1.3: Bhikkhū kālasseva bhojjayāguyā dhātā madhugoḷakena ca bhattagge na cittarūpaṃ paribhuñjanti.
pli-tv-kd6:25.1.4: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarena taruṇapasannena mahāmattena svātanāya buddhappamukho bhikkhusaṃgho nimantito hoti.
pli-tv-kd6:25.1.5: Atha kho tassa taruṇapasannassa mahāmattassa etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd6:25.1.6: “yannūnāhaṃ aḍḍhatelasannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ aḍḍhatelasāni maṃsapātisatāni paṭiyādeyyaṃ, ekamekassa bhikkhuno ekamekaṃ maṃsapātiṃ upanāmeyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:25.2.1: Atha kho so taruṇapasanno mahāmatto tassā rattiyā accayena paṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ paṭiyādāpetvā aḍḍhatelasāni ca maṃsapātisatāni, bhagavato kālaṃ ārocāpesi—“kālo, bhante, niṭṭhitaṃ bhattan”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:25.2.2: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena tassa taruṇapasannassa mahāmattassa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi, saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṃghena.
pli-tv-kd6:25.3.1: Atha kho so taruṇapasanno mahāmatto bhattagge bhikkhū parivisati.
pli-tv-kd6:25.3.4: “Mā kho tumhe, bhante—‘ayaṃ taruṇapasanno mahāmatto’ti—thokaṃ thokaṃ paṭiggaṇhatha.
pli-tv-kd6:25.3.5: Bahuṃ me khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ paṭiyattaṃ, aḍḍhatelasāni ca maṃsapātisatāni.
pli-tv-kd6:25.3.8: “Na kho mayaṃ, āvuso, etaṃkāraṇā thokaṃ thokaṃ paṭiggaṇhāma, api ca mayaṃ kālasseva bhojjayāguyā dhātā madhugoḷakena ca. Tena mayaṃ thokaṃ thokaṃ paṭiggaṇhāmā”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:25.4.1: Atha kho so taruṇapasanno mahāmatto ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti—
pli-tv-kd6:25.4.2: “kathañhi nāma bhadantā mayā nimantitā aññassa bhojjayāguṃ paribhuñjissanti, na cāhaṃ paṭibalo yāvadatthaṃ dātun”ti
pli-tv-kd6:25.4.3: kupito anattamano āsādanāpekkho bhikkhūnaṃ patte pūrento agamāsi—“bhuñjatha vā haratha vā”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:25.4.4: Atha kho so taruṇapasanno mahāmatto buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṃghaṃ paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappetvā sampavāretvā bhagavantaṃ bhuttāviṃ onītapattapāṇiṃ ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd6:25.4.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho taṃ taruṇapasannaṃ mahāmattaṃ bhagavā dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṃsetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd6:25.5.1: Atha kho tassa taruṇapasannassa mahāmattassa acirapakkantassa bhagavato ahudeva kukkuccaṃ, ahu vippaṭisāro—
pli-tv-kd6:25.5.2: “alābhā vata me, na vata me lābhā; dulladdhaṃ vata me, na vata me suladdhaṃ;
pli-tv-kd6:25.5.3: yohaṃ kupito anattamano āsādanāpekkho bhikkhūnaṃ patte pūrento agamāsiṃ—‘bhuñjatha vā haratha vā’ti.
pli-tv-kd6:25.5.4: Kiṃ nu kho mayā bahuṃ pasutaṃ puññaṃ vā apuññaṃ vā”ti?
pli-tv-kd6:25.5.5: Atha kho so taruṇapasanno mahāmatto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd6:25.5.6: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so taruṇapasanno mahāmatto bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd6:25.5.7: “idha mayhaṃ, bhante, acirapakkantassa bhagavato ahudeva kukkuccaṃ, ahu vippaṭisāro
pli-tv-kd6:25.5.8: ‘alābhā vata me, na vata me lābhā; dulladdhaṃ vata me, na vata me suladdhaṃ;
pli-tv-kd6:25.5.9: yohaṃ kupito anattamano āsādanāpekkho bhikkhūnaṃ patte pūrento agamāsiṃ—bhuñjatha vā haratha vāti.
pli-tv-kd6:25.5.10: Kiṃ nu kho mayā bahuṃ pasutaṃ, puññaṃ vā apuññaṃ vā’ti.
pli-tv-kd6:25.5.11: Kiṃ nu kho mayā, bhante, bahuṃ pasutaṃ, puññaṃ vā apuññaṃ vā”ti?
pli-tv-kd6:25.6.1: “Yadaggena tayā, āvuso, svātanāya buddhappamukho bhikkhusaṃgho nimantito tadaggena te bahuṃ puññaṃ pasutaṃ.
pli-tv-kd6:25.6.2: Yadaggena te ekamekena bhikkhunā ekamekaṃ sitthaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ tadaggena te bahuṃ puññaṃ pasutaṃ, saggā te āraddhā”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:25.6.3: Atha kho so taruṇapasanno mahāmatto—“lābhā kira me, suladdhaṃ kira me, bahuṃ kira mayā puññaṃ pasutaṃ, saggā kira me āraddhā”ti—
pli-tv-kd6:25.6.4: haṭṭho udaggo uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd6:25.7.1: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṃghaṃ sannipātāpetvā bhikkhū paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-kd6:25.7.2: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhū aññatra nimantitā aññassa bhojjayāguṃ paribhuñjantī”ti?
pli-tv-kd6:25.7.5: kathañhi nāma te, bhikkhave, moghapurisā aññatra nimantitā aññassa bhojjayāguṃ paribhuñjissanti.
pli-tv-kd6:25.7.7: vigarahitvā dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd6:25.7.8: “na, bhikkhave, aññatra nimantitena aññassa bhojjayāgu paribhuñjitabbā.
pli-tv-kd6:26.1.1: Atha kho bhagavā andhakavinde yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā yena rājagahaṃ tena cārikaṃ pakkāmi, mahatā bhikkhusaṃghena saddhiṃ, aḍḍhatelasehi bhikkhusatehi.
pli-tv-kd6:26.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena belaṭṭho kaccāno rājagahā andhakavindaṃ addhānamaggappaṭipanno hoti, pañcamattehi sakaṭasatehi, sabbeheva guḷakumbhapūrehi.
pli-tv-kd6:26.1.3: Addasā kho bhagavā belaṭṭhaṃ kaccānaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ, disvāna maggā okkamma aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd6:26.2.1: Atha kho belaṭṭho kaccāno yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
pli-tv-kd6:26.2.2: Ekamantaṃ ṭhito kho belaṭṭho kaccāno bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd6:26.2.3: “icchāmahaṃ, bhante, ekamekassa bhikkhuno ekamekaṃ guḷakumbhaṃ dātun”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:26.2.4: “Tena hi tvaṃ, kaccāna, ekaṃyeva guḷakumbhaṃ āharā”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:26.2.5: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho belaṭṭho kaccāno bhagavato paṭissuṇitvā ekaṃyeva guḷakumbhaṃ ādāya yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd6:26.2.8: “Tena hi tvaṃ, kaccāna, bhikkhūnaṃ guḷaṃ dehī”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:26.3.1: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho belaṭṭho kaccāno bhagavato paṭissuṇitvā bhikkhūnaṃ guḷaṃ datvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd6:26.3.2: “dinno, bhante, bhikkhūnaṃ guḷo, bahu cāyaṃ guḷo avasiṭṭho.
pli-tv-kd6:26.3.4: “Tena hi tvaṃ, kaccāna, bhikkhūnaṃ guḷaṃ yāvadatthaṃ dehī”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:26.3.5: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho belaṭṭho kaccāno bhagavato paṭissuṇitvā bhikkhūnaṃ guḷaṃ yāvadatthaṃ datvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd6:26.3.6: “dinno, bhante, bhikkhūnaṃ guḷo yāvadattho, bahu cāyaṃ guḷo avasiṭṭho.
pli-tv-kd6:26.3.8: “Tena hi tvaṃ, kaccāna, bhikkhū guḷehi santappehī”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:26.3.9: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho belaṭṭho kaccāno bhagavato paṭissuṇitvā bhikkhū guḷehi santappesi.
pli-tv-kd6:26.3.10: Ekacce bhikkhū pattepi pūresuṃ parissāvanānipi thavikāyopi pūresuṃ.
pli-tv-kd6:26.4.1: Atha kho belaṭṭho kaccāno bhikkhū guḷehi santappetvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd6:26.4.2: “santappitā, bhante, bhikkhū guḷehi, bahu cāyaṃ guḷo avasiṭṭho.
pli-tv-kd6:26.4.4: “Tena hi tvaṃ, kaccāna, vighāsādānaṃ guḷaṃ dehī”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:26.4.5: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho belaṭṭho kaccāno bhagavato paṭissuṇitvā vighāsādānaṃ guḷaṃ datvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd6:26.4.6: “dinno, bhante, vighāsādānaṃ guḷo, bahu cāyaṃ guḷo avasiṭṭho.
pli-tv-kd6:26.4.8: “Tena hi tvaṃ, kaccāna, vighāsādānaṃ guḷaṃ yāvadatthaṃ dehī”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:26.5.1: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho belaṭṭho kaccāno bhagavato paṭissuṇitvā vighāsādānaṃ guḷaṃ yāvadatthaṃ datvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd6:26.5.2: “dinno, bhante, vighāsādānaṃ guḷo yāvadattho, bahu cāyaṃ guḷo avasiṭṭho.
pli-tv-kd6:26.5.4: “Tena hi tvaṃ, kaccāna, vighāsāde guḷehi santappehī”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:26.5.5: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho belaṭṭho kaccāno bhagavato paṭissuṇitvā vighāsāde guḷehi santappesi.
pli-tv-kd6:26.5.6: Ekacce vighāsādā kolambepi ghaṭepi pūresuṃ, piṭakānipi ucchaṅgepi pūresuṃ.
pli-tv-kd6:26.6.1: Atha kho belaṭṭho kaccāno vighāsāde guḷehi santappetvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd6:26.6.2: “santappitā, bhante, vighāsādā guḷehi, bahu cāyaṃ guḷo avasiṭṭho.
pli-tv-kd6:26.6.4: “Nāhaṃ taṃ, kaccāna, passāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya yassa so guḷo paribhutto sammā pariṇāmaṃ gaccheyya, aññatra tathāgatassa vā tathāgatasāvakassa vā.
pli-tv-kd6:26.6.5: Tena hi tvaṃ, kaccāna, taṃ guḷaṃ appaharite vā chaḍḍehi, appāṇake vā udake opilāpehī”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:26.6.6: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho belaṭṭho kaccāno bhagavato paṭissuṇitvā taṃ guḷaṃ appāṇake udake opilāpeti.
pli-tv-kd6:26.7.1: Atha kho so guḷo udake pakkhitto cicciṭāyati ciṭiciṭāyati padhūpāyati sampadhūpāyati.
pli-tv-kd6:26.7.2: Seyyathāpi nāma phālo divasaṃsantatto udake pakkhitto cicciṭāyati ciṭiciṭāyati padhūpāyati sampadhūpāyati;
pli-tv-kd6:26.7.3: evameva so guḷo udake pakkhitto cicciṭāyati ciṭiciṭāyati padhūpāyati sampadhūpāyati.
pli-tv-kd6:26.7.4: Atha kho belaṭṭho kaccāno saṃviggo lomahaṭṭhajāto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd6:26.8.1: Ekamantaṃ nisinnassa kho belaṭṭhassa kaccānassa bhagavā anupubbiṃ kathaṃ kathesi, seyyathidaṃ—
pli-tv-kd6:26.8.2: dānakathaṃ sīlakathaṃ saggakathaṃ, kāmānaṃ ādīnavaṃ okāraṃ saṃkilesaṃ, nekkhamme ānisaṃsaṃ pakāsesi.
pli-tv-kd6:26.8.3: Yadā bhagavā aññāsi belaṭṭhaṃ kaccānaṃ kallacittaṃ, muducittaṃ, vinīvaraṇacittaṃ, udaggacittaṃ, pasannacittaṃ, atha yā buddhānaṃ sāmukkaṃsikā dhammadesanā, taṃ pakāsesi …pe…
pli-tv-kd6:26.8.4: evameva belaṭṭhassa kaccānassa tasmiṃyeva āsane virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi—
pli-tv-kd6:26.9.1: Atha kho belaṭṭho kaccāno diṭṭhadhammo pattadhammo viditadhammo pariyogāḷhadhammo tiṇṇavicikiccho vigatakathaṃkatho vesārajjappatto aparappaccayo satthusāsane bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd6:26.9.4: evamevaṃ kho bhagavatā anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito.
pli-tv-kd6:26.9.5: Esāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi, dhammañca, bhikkhusaṃghañca.
pli-tv-kd6:26.9.6: Upāsakaṃ maṃ bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇagatan”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:27.1.1: Atha kho bhagavā anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno yena rājagahaṃ tadavasari.
pli-tv-kd6:27.1.2: Tatra sudaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
pli-tv-kd6:27.1.3: Tena kho pana samayena rājagahe guḷo ussanno hoti.
pli-tv-kd6:28.1.1: Atha kho bhagavā rājagahe yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā yena pāṭaligāmo tena cārikaṃ pakkāmi, mahatā bhikkhusaṃghena saddhiṃ aḍḍhatelasehi bhikkhusatehi.
pli-tv-kd6:28.1.2: Atha kho bhagavā anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno yena pāṭaligāmo tadavasari.
pli-tv-kd6:28.1.5: Atha kho pāṭaligāmikā upāsakā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
pli-tv-kd6:28.1.6: Ekamantaṃ nisinne kho pāṭaligāmike upāsake bhagavā dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi, samādapesi, samuttejesi, sampahaṃsesi.
pli-tv-kd6:28.2.1: Atha kho pāṭaligāmikā upāsakā bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassitā samādapitā samuttejitā sampahaṃsitā bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-kd6:28.2.2: “adhivāsetu no, bhante, bhagavā āvasathāgāraṃ saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṃghenā”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:28.2.4: Atha kho pāṭaligāmikā upāsakā bhagavato adhivāsanaṃ viditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā yena āvasathāgāraṃ tenupasaṅkamiṃsu, upasaṅkamitvā sabbasanthariṃ āvasathāgāraṃ santharitvā, āsanāni paññapetvā, udakamaṇikaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā, telapadīpaṃ āropetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu.
pli-tv-kd6:28.3.1: Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho pāṭaligāmikā upāsakā bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-kd6:28.3.7: Atha kho bhagavā nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṃghena yena āvasathāgāraṃ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā pāde pakkhāletvā āvasathāgāraṃ pavisitvā majjhimaṃ thambhaṃ nissāya puratthābhimukho nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd6:28.3.8: Bhikkhusaṃghopi kho pāde pakkhāletvā āvasathāgāraṃ pavisitvā pacchimaṃ bhittiṃ nissāya puratthābhimukho nisīdi, bhagavantaṃyeva purakkhatvā.
pli-tv-kd6:28.3.9: Pāṭaligāmikāpi kho upāsakā pāde pakkhāletvā āvasathāgāraṃ pavisitvā puratthimaṃ bhittiṃ nissāya pacchimābhimukhā nisīdiṃsu, bhagavantaṃyeva purakkhatvā.
pli-tv-kd6:28.3.10: Atha kho bhagavā pāṭaligāmike upāsake āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd6:28.4.3: Idha, gahapatayo, dussīlo sīlavipanno pamādādhikaraṇaṃ mahatiṃ bhogajāniṃ nigacchati.
pli-tv-kd6:28.4.5: Puna caparaṃ, gahapatayo, dussīlassa sīlavipannassa pāpako kittisaddo abbhuggacchati.
pli-tv-kd6:28.4.7: Puna caparaṃ, gahapatayo, dussīlo sīlavipanno yaññadeva parisaṃ upasaṅkamati, yadi khattiyaparisaṃ, yadi brāhmaṇaparisaṃ, yadi gahapatiparisaṃ, yadi samaṇaparisaṃ, avisārado upasaṅkamati maṅkubhūto.
pli-tv-kd6:28.4.9: Puna caparaṃ, gahapatayo, dussīlo sīlavipanno sammūḷho kālaṃ karoti.
pli-tv-kd6:28.4.11: Puna caparaṃ, gahapatayo, dussīlo sīlavipanno kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati.
pli-tv-kd6:28.4.13: Ime kho, gahapatayo, pañca ādīnavā dussīlassa sīlavipattiyā.
pli-tv-kd6:28.5.3: Idha, gahapatayo, sīlavā sīlasampanno appamādādhikaraṇaṃ mahantaṃ bhogakkhandhaṃ adhigacchati.
pli-tv-kd6:28.5.5: Puna caparaṃ, gahapatayo, sīlavato sīlasampannassa kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggacchati.
pli-tv-kd6:28.5.7: Puna caparaṃ, gahapatayo, sīlavā sīlasampanno yaññadeva parisaṃ upasaṅkamati, yadi khattiyaparisaṃ, yadi brāhmaṇaparisaṃ, yadi gahapatiparisaṃ, yadi samaṇaparisaṃ, visārado upasaṅkamati amaṅkubhūto.
pli-tv-kd6:28.5.9: Puna caparaṃ, gahapatayo, sīlavā sīlasampanno asammūḷho kālaṃ karoti.
pli-tv-kd6:28.5.11: Puna caparaṃ, gahapatayo, sīlavā sīlasampanno kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati.
pli-tv-kd6:28.5.13: Ime kho, gahapatayo, pañca ānisaṃsā sīlavato sīlasampadāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:28.6.1: Atha kho bhagavā pāṭaligāmike upāsake bahudeva rattiṃ dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṃsetvā uyyojesi—
pli-tv-kd6:28.6.4: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti, kho pāṭaligāmikā upāsakā bhagavato paṭissuṇitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkamiṃsu.
pli-tv-kd6:28.7.1: Atha kho bhagavā acirapakkantesu pāṭaligāmikesu upāsakesu suññāgāraṃ pāvisi.
pli-tv-kd6:28.7.3: Tena kho pana samayena sunidhavassakārā magadhamahāmattā pāṭaligāme nagaraṃ māpenti vajjīnaṃ paṭibāhāya.
pli-tv-kd6:28.7.4: Addasā kho bhagavā rattiyā paccūsasamayaṃ paccuṭṭhāya dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena sambahulā devatāyo pāṭaligāme vatthūni pariggaṇhantiyo.
pli-tv-kd6:28.7.5: Yasmiṃ padese mahesakkhā devatā vatthūni pariggaṇhanti, mahesakkhānaṃ tattha rājūnaṃ rājamahāmattānaṃ cittāni namanti nivesanāni māpetuṃ.
pli-tv-kd6:28.7.6: Yasmiṃ padese majjhimā devatā vatthūni pariggaṇhanti, majjhimānaṃ tattha rājūnaṃ rājamahāmattānaṃ cittāni namanti nivesanāni māpetuṃ.
pli-tv-kd6:28.7.7: Yasmiṃ padese nīcā devatā vatthūni pariggaṇhanti, nīcānaṃ tattha rājūnaṃ rājamahāmattānaṃ cittāni namanti nivesanāni māpetuṃ.
pli-tv-kd6:28.7.8: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd6:28.7.9: “ke nu kho te, ānanda, pāṭaligāme nagaraṃ māpentī”ti?
pli-tv-kd6:28.8.1: “Sunidhavassakārā, bhante, magadhamahāmattā pāṭaligāme nagaraṃ māpenti vajjīnaṃ paṭibāhāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:28.8.3: evameva kho, ānanda, sunidhavassakārā magadhamahāmattā pāṭaligāme nagaraṃ māpenti vajjīnaṃ paṭibāhāya.
pli-tv-kd6:28.8.4: Idhāhaṃ, ānanda, rattiyā paccūsasamayaṃ paccuṭṭhāya addasaṃ dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena sambahulā devatāyo pāṭaligāme vatthūni pariggaṇhantiyo.
pli-tv-kd6:28.8.5: Yasmiṃ padese mahesakkhā devatā vatthūni pariggaṇhanti, mahesakkhānaṃ tattha rājūnaṃ rājamahāmattānaṃ cittāni namanti nivesanāni māpetuṃ.
pli-tv-kd6:28.8.6: Yasmiṃ padese majjhimā devatā vatthūni pariggaṇhanti, majjhimānaṃ tattha rājūnaṃ rājamahāmattānaṃ cittāni namanti nivesanāni māpetuṃ.
pli-tv-kd6:28.8.7: Yasmiṃ padese nīcā devatā vatthūni pariggaṇhanti, nīcānaṃ tattha rājūnaṃ rājamahāmattānaṃ cittāni namanti nivesanāni māpetuṃ.
pli-tv-kd6:28.8.8: Yāvatā, ānanda, ariyaṃ āyatanaṃ, yāvatā vaṇippatho, idaṃ agganagaraṃ bhavissati pāṭaliputtaṃ puṭabhedanaṃ.
pli-tv-kd6:28.8.9: Pāṭaliputtassa kho, ānanda, tayo antarāyā bhavissanti—
pli-tv-kd6:28.8.10: aggito vā udakato vā abbhantarato vā mithubhedā”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:28.9.1: Atha kho sunidhavassakārā magadhamahāmattā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodiṃsu, sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu.
pli-tv-kd6:28.10.1: Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho sunidhavassakārā magadhamahāmattā bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-kd6:28.10.2: “adhivāsetu no bhavaṃ gotamo ajjatanāya bhattaṃ saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṃghenā”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:28.10.4: Atha kho sunidhavassakārā magadhamahāmattā bhagavato adhivāsanaṃ viditvā pakkamiṃsu.
pli-tv-kd6:28.10.5: Atha kho sunidhavassakārā magadhamahāmattā paṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ paṭiyādāpetvā bhagavato kālaṃ ārocāpesuṃ—“kālo, bho gotama, niṭṭhitaṃ bhattan”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:28.10.6: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena sunidhavassakārānaṃ magadhamahāmattānaṃ parivesanā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṃghena.
pli-tv-kd6:28.10.7: Atha kho sunidhavassakārā magadhamahāmattā buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṃghaṃ paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappetvā sampavāretvā bhagavantaṃ bhuttāviṃ onītapattapāṇiṃ ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
pli-tv-kd6:28.10.8: Ekamantaṃ nisinne kho sunidhavassakāre magadhamahāmatte bhagavā imāhi gāthāhi anumodi—
pli-tv-kd6:28.11.13: Atha kho bhagavā sunidhavassakāre magadhamahāmatte imāhi gāthāhi anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd6:28.12.1: Tena kho pana samayena sunidhavassakārā magadhamahāmattā bhagavantaṃ piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhā honti—
pli-tv-kd6:28.12.2: “yenajja samaṇo gotamo dvārena nikkhamissati, taṃ gotamadvāraṃ nāma bhavissati;
pli-tv-kd6:28.12.3: yena titthena gaṅgaṃ nadiṃ uttarissati, taṃ gotamatitthaṃ nāma bhavissatī”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:28.12.4: Atha kho bhagavā yena dvārena nikkhami, taṃ gotamadvāraṃ nāma ahosi.
pli-tv-kd6:28.12.5: Atha kho bhagavā yena gaṅgā nadī tenupasaṅkami.
pli-tv-kd6:28.12.6: Tena kho pana samayena gaṅgā nadī pūrā hoti samatittikā kākapeyyā.
pli-tv-kd6:28.12.7: Manussā aññe nāvaṃ pariyesanti, aññe uḷumpaṃ pariyesanti, aññe kullaṃ bandhanti orā pāraṃ gantukāmā.
pli-tv-kd6:28.13.1: Addasā kho bhagavā te manusse aññe nāvaṃ pariyesante, aññe uḷumpaṃ pariyesante, aññe kullaṃ bandhante orā pāraṃ gantukāme, disvāna seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya, pasāritaṃ vā bāhaṃ samiñjeyya; evameva kho—gaṅgāya nadiyā orimatīre antarahito pārimatīre paccuṭṭhāsi saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṃghena.
pli-tv-kd6:28.13.2: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi—
pli-tv-kd6:29.1.1: Atha kho bhagavā yena koṭigāmo tenupasaṅkami.
pli-tv-kd6:29.1.4: “catunnaṃ, bhikkhave, ariyasaccānaṃ ananubodhā appaṭivedhā evamidaṃ dīghamaddhānaṃ sandhāvitaṃ saṃsaritaṃ mamañceva tumhākañca.
pli-tv-kd6:29.1.6: Dukkhassa, bhikkhave, ariyasaccassa ananubodhā appaṭivedhā evamidaṃ dīghamaddhānaṃ sandhāvitaṃ saṃsaritaṃ mamañceva tumhākañca.
pli-tv-kd6:29.1.9: dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya ariyasaccassa ananubodhā appaṭivedhā evamidaṃ dīghamaddhānaṃ sandhāvitaṃ saṃsaritaṃ mamañceva tumhākañca.
pli-tv-kd6:29.2.1: Tayidaṃ, bhikkhave, dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ anubuddhaṃ paṭividdhaṃ, dukkhasamudayaṃ ariyasaccaṃ anubuddhaṃ paṭividdhaṃ, dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ anubuddhaṃ paṭividdhaṃ, dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccaṃ anubuddhaṃ paṭividdhaṃ, ucchinnā bhavataṇhā, khīṇā bhavanetti, natthi dāni punabbhavoti.
pli-tv-kd6:30.1.3: Atha kho ambapālī gaṇikā bhadrāni bhadrāni yānāni yojāpetvā bhadraṃ bhadraṃ yānaṃ abhiruhitvā bhadrehi bhadrehi yānehi vesāliyā niyyāsi bhagavantaṃ dassanāya.
pli-tv-kd6:30.1.4: Yāvatikā yānassa bhūmi, yānena gantvā, yānā paccorohitvā, pattikāva yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd6:30.2.1: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho ambapāliṃ gaṇikaṃ bhagavā dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṃsesi.
pli-tv-kd6:30.2.2: Atha kho ambapālī gaṇikā bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassitā samādapitā samuttejitā sampahaṃsitā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd6:30.2.3: “adhivāsetu me, bhante, bhagavā svātanāya bhattaṃ saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṃghenā”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:30.2.5: Atha kho ambapālī gaṇikā bhagavato adhivāsanaṃ viditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd6:30.3.3: Atha kho vesālikā licchavī bhadrāni bhadrāni yānāni yojāpetvā bhadraṃ bhadraṃ yānaṃ abhiruhitvā bhadrehi bhadrehi yānehi vesāliyā niyyāsuṃ bhagavantaṃ dassanāya.
pli-tv-kd6:30.3.4: Appekacce licchavī nīlā honti nīlavaṇṇā nīlavatthā nīlālaṅkārā, appekacce licchavī pītā honti pītavaṇṇā pītavatthā pītālaṅkārā, appekacce licchavī lohitā honti lohitavaṇṇā lohitavatthā lohitālaṅkārā, appekacce licchavī odātā honti odātavaṇṇā odātavatthā odātālaṅkārā.
pli-tv-kd6:30.3.5: Atha kho ambapālī gaṇikā daharānaṃ daharānaṃ licchavīnaṃ īsāya īsaṃ yugena yugaṃ cakkena cakkaṃ akkhena akkhaṃ paṭivaṭṭesi.
pli-tv-kd6:30.4.1: Atha kho te licchavī ambapāliṃ gaṇikaṃ etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-kd6:30.4.2: “kissa, je ambapāli, daharānaṃ daharānaṃ licchavīnaṃ īsāya īsaṃ yugena yugaṃ cakkena cakkaṃ akkhena akkhaṃ paṭivaṭṭesī”ti?
pli-tv-kd6:30.4.3: “Tathā hi pana mayā, ayyaputtā, svātanāya buddhappamukho bhikkhusaṃgho nimantito”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:30.4.4: “Dehi, je ambapāli, amhākaṃ etaṃ bhattaṃ satasahassenā”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:30.4.5: “Sacepi me, ayyaputtā, vesāliṃ sāhāraṃ dajjeyyātha, neva dajjāhaṃ taṃ bhattan”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:30.4.6: Atha kho te licchavī aṅguliṃ phoṭesuṃ—
pli-tv-kd6:30.4.7: “jitamha vata bho ambakāya, parājitamha vata bho ambakāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:30.5.1: Atha kho te licchavī yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu.
pli-tv-kd6:30.5.2: Addasā kho bhagavā te licchavī dūratova āgacchante, disvāna bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd6:30.5.3: “yehi, bhikkhave, bhikkhūhi devā tāvatiṃsā adiṭṭhapubbā, oloketha, bhikkhave, licchavīparisaṃ;
pli-tv-kd6:30.5.6: Atha kho te licchavī yāvatikā yānassa bhūmi, yānena gantvā yānā paccorohitvā pattikāva yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
pli-tv-kd6:30.5.8: Ekamantaṃ nisinne kho te licchavī bhagavā dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṃsesi.
pli-tv-kd6:30.5.9: Atha kho te licchavī, bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassitā samādapitā samuttejitā sampahaṃsitā bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-kd6:30.5.10: “adhivāsetu no, bhante, bhagavā svātanāya bhattaṃ saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṃghenā”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:30.5.12: Atha kho te licchavī aṅguliṃ phoṭesuṃ—
pli-tv-kd6:30.5.13: “jitamha vata bho ambakāya, parājitamha vata bho ambakāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:30.5.14: Atha kho te licchavī bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkamiṃsu.
pli-tv-kd6:30.6.1: Atha kho bhagavā koṭigāme yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā yena nātikā tenupasaṅkami.
pli-tv-kd6:30.6.2: Tatra sudaṃ bhagavā nātike viharati giñjakāvasathe.
pli-tv-kd6:30.6.3: Atha kho ambapālī gaṇikā tassā rattiyā accayena sake ārāme paṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ paṭiyādāpetvā bhagavato kālaṃ ārocāpesi—“kālo, bhante, niṭṭhitaṃ bhattan”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:30.6.4: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena ambapāliyā gaṇikāya parivesanā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṃghena.
pli-tv-kd6:30.6.5: Atha kho ambapālī gaṇikā buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṃghaṃ paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappetvā sampavāretvā bhagavantaṃ bhuttāviṃ onītapattapāṇiṃ ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho ambapālī gaṇikā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd6:30.6.8: Atha kho bhagavā ambapāliṃ gaṇikaṃ dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṃsetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā yena mahāvanaṃ tenupasaṅkami.
pli-tv-kd6:30.6.9: Tatra sudaṃ bhagavā vesāliyaṃ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ.
pli-tv-kd6:31.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena abhiññātā abhiññātā licchavī sandhāgāre sannisinnā sannipatitā anekapariyāyena buddhassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti, dhammassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti, saṃghassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti.
pli-tv-kd6:31.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena sīho senāpati nigaṇṭhasāvako tassaṃ parisāyaṃ nisinno hoti.
pli-tv-kd6:31.1.4: “nissaṃsayaṃ kho so bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho bhavissati, tathā hime abhiññātā abhiññātā licchavī sandhāgāre sannisinnā sannipatitā anekapariyāyena buddhassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti, dhammassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti, saṃghassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti.
pli-tv-kd6:31.1.5: Yannūnāhaṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkameyyaṃ arahantaṃ sammāsambuddhan”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:31.2.1: Atha kho sīho senāpati yena nigaṇṭho nāṭaputto tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā nigaṇṭhaṃ nāṭaputtaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd6:31.2.3: “Kiṃ pana tvaṃ, sīha, kiriyavādo samāno akiriyavādaṃ samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamissasi?
pli-tv-kd6:31.2.4: Samaṇo hi, sīha, gotamo akiriyavādo akiriyāya dhammaṃ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetī”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:31.2.5: Atha kho sīhassa senāpatissa yo ahosi gamikābhisaṅkhāro bhagavantaṃ dassanāya, so paṭippassambhi.
pli-tv-kd6:31.3.1: Dutiyampi kho abhiññātā abhiññātā licchavī sandhāgāre sannisinnā sannipatitā anekapariyāyena buddhassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti, dhammassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti, saṃghassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti.
pli-tv-kd6:31.3.3: “nissaṃsayaṃ kho so bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho bhavissati, tathā hime abhiññātā abhiññātā licchavī sandhāgāre sannisinnā sannipatitā anekapariyāyena buddhassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti, dhammassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti, saṃghassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti.
pli-tv-kd6:31.3.4: Yannūnāhaṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkameyyaṃ arahantaṃ sammāsambuddhan”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:31.3.5: Dutiyampi kho sīho senāpati yena nigaṇṭho nāṭaputto tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā nigaṇṭhaṃ nāṭaputtaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd6:31.3.7: “Kiṃ pana tvaṃ, sīha, kiriyavādo samāno akiriyavādaṃ samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamissasi?
pli-tv-kd6:31.3.8: Samaṇo hi, sīha, gotamo akiriyavādo akiriyāya dhammaṃ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetī”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:31.3.9: Dutiyampi kho sīhassa senāpatissa yo ahosi gamikābhisaṅkhāro bhagavantaṃ dassanāya, so paṭippassambhi.
pli-tv-kd6:31.3.10: Tatiyampi kho abhiññātā abhiññātā licchavī sandhāgāre sannisinnā sannipatitā anekapariyāyena buddhassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti, dhammassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti, saṃghassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti.
pli-tv-kd6:31.3.12: “nissaṃsayaṃ kho so bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho bhavissati, tathā hime abhiññātā abhiññātā licchavī sandhāgāre sannisinnā sannipatitā anekapariyāyena buddhassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti, dhammassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti, saṃghassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti.
pli-tv-kd6:31.3.13: Kiñhi me karissanti nigaṇṭhā apalokitā vā anapalokitā vā?
pli-tv-kd6:31.3.14: Yannūnāhaṃ anapaloketvāva nigaṇṭhe taṃ bhagavantaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkameyyaṃ arahantaṃ sammāsambuddhan”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:31.4.1: Atha kho sīho senāpati pañcahi rathasatehi divādivassa vesāliyā niyyāsi bhagavantaṃ dassanāya.
pli-tv-kd6:31.4.2: Yāvatikā yānassa bhūmi, yānena gantvā yānā paccorohitvā pattikova yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd6:31.4.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho sīho senāpati bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd6:31.4.4: “sutaṃ me taṃ, bhante—‘akiriyavādo samaṇo gotamo akiriyāya dhammaṃ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetī’ti.
pli-tv-kd6:31.4.5: Ye te, bhante, evamāhaṃsu—‘akiriyavādo samaṇo gotamo, akiriyāya dhammaṃ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetī’ti.
pli-tv-kd6:31.4.6: Kacci te, bhante, bhagavato vuttavādino, na ca bhagavantaṃ abhūtena abbhācikkhanti, dhammassa cānudhammaṃ byākaronti, na ca koci sahadhammiko vādānuvādo gārayhaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgacchati?
pli-tv-kd6:31.5.1: “Atthi, sīha, pariyāyo, yena maṃ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya—
pli-tv-kd6:31.5.2: akiriyavādo samaṇo gotamo, akiriyāya dhammaṃ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetīti.
pli-tv-kd6:31.5.3: Atthi, sīha, pariyāyo, yena maṃ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya—
pli-tv-kd6:31.5.4: kiriyavādo samaṇo gotamo kiriyāya dhammaṃ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetīti.
pli-tv-kd6:31.5.5: Atthi, sīha, pariyāyo, yena maṃ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya—
pli-tv-kd6:31.5.6: ucchedavādo samaṇo gotamo ucchedāya dhammaṃ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetīti.
pli-tv-kd6:31.5.7: Atthi, sīha, pariyāyo, yena maṃ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya—
pli-tv-kd6:31.5.8: jegucchī samaṇo gotamo, jegucchitāya dhammaṃ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetīti.
pli-tv-kd6:31.5.9: Atthi, sīha, pariyāyo, yena maṃ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya—
pli-tv-kd6:31.5.10: venayiko samaṇo gotamo, vinayāya dhammaṃ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetīti.
pli-tv-kd6:31.5.11: Atthi, sīha, pariyāyo, yena maṃ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya—
pli-tv-kd6:31.5.12: tapassī samaṇo gotamo, tapassitāya dhammaṃ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetīti.
pli-tv-kd6:31.5.13: Atthi, sīha, pariyāyo, yena maṃ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya—
pli-tv-kd6:31.5.14: apagabbho samaṇo gotamo, apagabbhatāya dhammaṃ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetīti.
pli-tv-kd6:31.5.15: Atthi, sīha, pariyāyo, yena maṃ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya—
pli-tv-kd6:31.5.16: assattho samaṇo gotamo, assāsāya dhammaṃ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetīti.
pli-tv-kd6:31.6.1: Katamo ca, sīha, pariyāyo, yena maṃ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya—
pli-tv-kd6:31.6.2: akiriyavādo samaṇo gotamo, akiriyāya dhammaṃ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetīti?
pli-tv-kd6:31.6.3: Ahañhi, sīha, akiriyaṃ vadāmi kāyaduccaritassa vacīduccaritassa manoduccaritassa;
pli-tv-kd6:31.6.4: anekavihitānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ akiriyaṃ vadāmi.
pli-tv-kd6:31.6.5: Ayaṃ kho, sīha, pariyāyo, yena maṃ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya—
pli-tv-kd6:31.6.6: akiriyavādo samaṇo gotamo, akiriyāya dhammaṃ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetīti.
pli-tv-kd6:31.6.7: Katamo ca, sīha, pariyāyo, yena maṃ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya—
pli-tv-kd6:31.6.8: kiriyavādo samaṇo gotamo, kiriyāya dhammaṃ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetīti?
pli-tv-kd6:31.6.9: Ahañhi, sīha, kiriyaṃ vadāmi kāyasucaritassa vacīsucaritassa manosucaritassa, anekavihitānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ kiriyaṃ vadāmi.
pli-tv-kd6:31.6.10: Ayaṃ kho, sīha, pariyāyo, yena maṃ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya—
pli-tv-kd6:31.6.11: kiriyavādo samaṇo gotamo, kiriyāya dhammaṃ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetīti.
pli-tv-kd6:31.7.1: Katamo ca, sīha, pariyāyo, yena maṃ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya—
pli-tv-kd6:31.7.2: ucchedavādo samaṇo gotamo, ucchedāya dhammaṃ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetīti?
pli-tv-kd6:31.7.3: Ahañhi, sīha, ucchedaṃ vadāmi rāgassa dosassa mohassa;
pli-tv-kd6:31.7.4: anekavihitānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ucchedaṃ vadāmi.
pli-tv-kd6:31.7.5: Ayaṃ kho, sīha, pariyāyo, yena maṃ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya—
pli-tv-kd6:31.7.6: ucchedavādo samaṇo gotamo ucchedāya dhammaṃ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetīti.
pli-tv-kd6:31.7.7: Katamo ca, sīha, pariyāyo, yena maṃ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya—
pli-tv-kd6:31.7.8: jegucchī samaṇo gotamo, jegucchitāya dhammaṃ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetīti?
pli-tv-kd6:31.7.9: Ahañhi, sīha, jigucchāmi kāyaduccaritena vacīduccaritena manoduccaritena;
pli-tv-kd6:31.7.10: anekavihitānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattiyā jigucchāmi.
pli-tv-kd6:31.7.11: Ayaṃ kho, sīha, pariyāyo, yena maṃ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya—
pli-tv-kd6:31.7.12: jegucchī samaṇo gotamo, jegucchitāya dhammaṃ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetīti.
pli-tv-kd6:31.8.1: Katamo ca, sīha, pariyāyo, yena maṃ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya—
pli-tv-kd6:31.8.2: venayiko samaṇo gotamo, vinayāya dhammaṃ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetīti?
pli-tv-kd6:31.8.3: Ahañhi, sīha, vinayāya dhammaṃ desemi rāgassa dosassa mohassa;
pli-tv-kd6:31.8.4: anekavihitānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ vinayāya dhammaṃ desemi.
pli-tv-kd6:31.8.5: Ayaṃ kho, sīha, pariyāyo, yena maṃ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya—
pli-tv-kd6:31.8.6: venayiko samaṇo gotamo, vinayāya dhammaṃ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetīti.
pli-tv-kd6:31.8.7: Katamo ca, sīha, pariyāyo, yena maṃ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya—
pli-tv-kd6:31.8.8: tapassī samaṇo gotamo, tapassitāya dhammaṃ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetīti?
pli-tv-kd6:31.8.9: Tapanīyāhaṃ, sīha, pāpake akusale dhamme vadāmi—
pli-tv-kd6:31.8.11: Yassa kho, sīha, tapanīyā pāpakā akusalā dhammā pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā, tamahaṃ tapassīti vadāmi.
pli-tv-kd6:31.8.12: Tathāgatassa kho, sīha, tapanīyā pāpakā akusalā dhammā pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā.
pli-tv-kd6:31.8.13: Ayaṃ kho, sīha, pariyāyo, yena maṃ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya tapassī samaṇo gotamo tapassitāya dhammaṃ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetīti.
pli-tv-kd6:31.9.1: Katamo ca, sīha, pariyāyo, yena maṃ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya—
pli-tv-kd6:31.9.2: apagabbho samaṇo gotamo apagabbhatāya dhammaṃ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetīti?
pli-tv-kd6:31.9.3: Yassa kho, sīha, āyatiṃ gabbhaseyyā punabbhavābhinibbatti pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā, tamahaṃ apagabbhoti vadāmi.
pli-tv-kd6:31.9.4: Tathāgatassa kho, sīha, āyatiṃ gabbhaseyyā punabbhavābhinibbatti pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā.
pli-tv-kd6:31.9.5: Ayaṃ kho, sīha, pariyāyo, yena maṃ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya—
pli-tv-kd6:31.9.6: apagabbho samaṇo gotamo, apagabbhatāya dhammaṃ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetīti.
pli-tv-kd6:31.9.7: Katamo ca, sīha, pariyāyo, yena maṃ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya—
pli-tv-kd6:31.9.8: assattho samaṇo gotamo assāsāya dhammaṃ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetīti?
pli-tv-kd6:31.9.9: Ahañhi, sīha, assattho paramena assāsena, assāsāya dhammaṃ desemi, tena ca sāvake vinemi.
pli-tv-kd6:31.9.10: Ayaṃ kho, sīha, pariyāyo, yena maṃ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya—
pli-tv-kd6:31.9.11: assattho samaṇo gotamo assāsāya dhammaṃ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetī”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:31.10.1: Evaṃ vutte sīho senāpati bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd6:31.10.3: upāsakaṃ maṃ bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatan”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:31.10.4: “Anuviccakāraṃ kho, sīha, karohi; anuviccakāro tumhādisānaṃ ñātamanussānaṃ sādhu hotī”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:31.10.5: “Imināpāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavato bhiyyoso mattāya attamano abhiraddho, yaṃ maṃ bhagavā evamāha—
pli-tv-kd6:31.10.6: ‘anuviccakāraṃ kho, sīha, karohi; anuviccakāro tumhādisānaṃ ñātamanussānaṃ sādhu hotī’ti.
pli-tv-kd6:31.10.7: Mamañhi, bhante, aññatitthiyā sāvakaṃ labhitvā kevalakappaṃ vesāliṃ paṭākaṃ parihareyyuṃ—‘sīho kho amhākaṃ senāpati sāvakattaṃ upagato’ti.
pli-tv-kd6:31.10.8: Atha ca pana maṃ bhagavā evamāha—
pli-tv-kd6:31.10.9: ‘anuviccakāraṃ kho, sīha, karohi; anuviccakāro tumhādisānaṃ ñātamanussānaṃ sādhu hotī’ti.
pli-tv-kd6:31.10.10: Esāhaṃ, bhante, dutiyampi bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṃghañca.
pli-tv-kd6:31.10.11: Upāsakaṃ maṃ bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatan”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:31.11.1: “Dīgharattaṃ kho te, sīha, nigaṇṭhānaṃ opānabhūtaṃ kulaṃ, yena nesaṃ upagatānaṃ piṇḍakaṃ dātabbaṃ maññeyyāsī”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:31.11.2: “Imināpāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavato bhiyyoso mattāya attamano abhiraddho, yaṃ maṃ bhagavā evamāha—
pli-tv-kd6:31.11.3: ‘dīgharattaṃ kho te, sīha, nigaṇṭhānaṃ opānabhūtaṃ kulaṃ, yena nesaṃ upagatānaṃ piṇḍakaṃ dātabbaṃ maññeyyāsī’ti.
pli-tv-kd6:31.11.4: Sutaṃ me taṃ, bhante, samaṇo gotamo evamāha—
pli-tv-kd6:31.11.5: ‘mayhameva dānaṃ dātabbaṃ, na aññesaṃ dānaṃ dātabbaṃ; mayhameva sāvakānaṃ dānaṃ dātabbaṃ, na aññesaṃ sāvakānaṃ dānaṃ dātabbaṃ;
pli-tv-kd6:31.11.6: mayhameva dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ, na aññesaṃ dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ; mayhameva sāvakānaṃ dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ, na aññesaṃ sāvakānaṃ dinnaṃ mahapphalan’ti.
pli-tv-kd6:31.11.7: Atha ca pana maṃ bhagavā nigaṇṭhesupi dāne samādapeti.
pli-tv-kd6:31.11.8: Api ca, bhante, mayamettha kālaṃ jānissāma.
pli-tv-kd6:31.11.9: Esāhaṃ, bhante, tatiyampi bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṃghañca.
pli-tv-kd6:31.11.10: Upāsakaṃ maṃ bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatan”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:31.12.1: Atha kho bhagavā sīhassa senāpatissa anupubbiṃ kathaṃ kathesi, seyyathidaṃ—
pli-tv-kd6:31.12.4: “adhivāsetu me, bhante, bhagavā svātanāya bhattaṃ saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṃghenā”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:31.12.6: Atha kho sīho senāpati bhagavato adhivāsanaṃ viditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd6:31.12.7: Atha kho sīho senāpati aññataraṃ purisaṃ āṇāpesi—
pli-tv-kd6:31.12.9: Atha kho sīho senāpati tassā rattiyā accayena paṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ paṭiyādāpetvā bhagavato kālaṃ ārocāpesi—“kālo, bhante, niṭṭhitaṃ bhattan”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:31.12.10: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena sīhassa senāpatissa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṃghena.
pli-tv-kd6:31.13.1: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā nigaṇṭhā vesāliyaṃ rathikāya rathikaṃ siṅghāṭakena siṅghāṭakaṃ bāhā paggayha kandanti—
pli-tv-kd6:31.13.2: “ajja sīhena senāpatinā thūlaṃ pasuṃ vadhitvā samaṇassa gotamassa bhattaṃ kataṃ, taṃ samaṇo gotamo jānaṃ uddissakataṃ maṃsaṃ paribhuñjati paṭiccakamman”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:31.13.3: Atha kho aññataro puriso yena sīho senāpati tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā sīhassa senāpatissa upakaṇṇake ārocesi—
pli-tv-kd6:31.13.4: “yagghe, bhante, jāneyyāsi, ete sambahulā nigaṇṭhā vesāliyaṃ rathikāya rathikaṃ siṅghāṭakena siṅghāṭakaṃ bāhā paggayha kandanti—
pli-tv-kd6:31.13.5: ‘ajja sīhena senāpatinā thūlaṃ pasuṃ vadhitvā samaṇassa gotamassa bhattaṃ kataṃ, taṃ samaṇo gotamo jānaṃ uddissakataṃ maṃsaṃ paribhuñjati paṭiccakamman’”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:31.13.6: “Alaṃ, ayyo, dīgharattampi te āyasmantā avaṇṇakāmā buddhassa, avaṇṇakāmā dhammassa, avaṇṇakāmā saṃghassa;
pli-tv-kd6:31.13.7: na ca pana te āyasmantā jiridanti taṃ bhagavantaṃ asatā tucchā musā abhūtena abbhācikkhantā;
pli-tv-kd6:31.13.8: na ca mayaṃ jīvitahetupi sañcicca pāṇaṃ jīvitā voropeyyāmā”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:31.14.1: Atha kho sīho senāpati buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṃghaṃ paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappetvā sampavāretvā bhagavantaṃ bhuttāviṃ onītapattapāṇiṃ ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd6:31.14.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho sīhaṃ senāpatiṃ bhagavā dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṃsetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd6:31.14.3: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd6:31.14.6: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tikoṭiparisuddhaṃ macchamaṃsaṃ—adiṭṭhaṃ assutaṃ aparisaṅkitan”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:32.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena vesālī subhikkhā hoti susassā sulabhapiṇḍā, sukarā uñchena paggahena yāpetuṃ.
pli-tv-kd6:32.1.2: Atha kho bhagavato rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi—
pli-tv-kd6:32.1.3: “yāni tāni mayā bhikkhūnaṃ anuññātāni dubbhikkhe dussasse dullabhapiṇḍe anto vuṭṭhaṃ anto pakkaṃ sāmaṃ pakkaṃ uggahitapaṭiggahitakaṃ tato nīhaṭaṃ purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ vanaṭṭhaṃ pokkharaṭṭhaṃ, ajjāpi nu kho tāni bhikkhū paribhuñjantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:32.1.4: Atha kho bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd6:32.1.5: “yāni tāni, ānanda, mayā bhikkhūnaṃ anuññātāni dubbhikkhe dussasse dullabhapiṇḍe anto vuṭṭhaṃ anto pakkaṃ sāmaṃ pakkaṃ uggahitapaṭiggahitakaṃ tato nīhaṭaṃ purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ vanaṭṭhaṃ pokkharaṭṭhaṃ, ajjāpi nu kho tāni bhikkhū paribhuñjantī”ti?
pli-tv-kd6:32.2.1: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd6:32.2.2: “yāni tāni, bhikkhave, mayā bhikkhūnaṃ anuññātāni dubbhikkhe dussasse dullabhapiṇḍe anto vuṭṭhaṃ anto pakkaṃ sāmaṃ pakkaṃ uggahitapaṭiggahitakaṃ tato nīhaṭaṃ purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ vanaṭṭhaṃ pokkharaṭṭhaṃ, tānāhaṃ ajjatagge paṭikkhipāmi.
pli-tv-kd6:32.2.3: Na, bhikkhave, anto vuṭṭhaṃ anto pakkaṃ sāmaṃ pakkaṃ uggahitapaṭiggahitakaṃ paribhuñjitabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd6:32.2.5: Na ca, bhikkhave, tato nīhaṭaṃ purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ vanaṭṭhaṃ pokkharaṭṭhaṃ bhuttāvinā pavāritena anatirittaṃ paribhuñjitabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd6:33.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena jānapadā manussā bahuṃ loṇampi, telampi, taṇḍulampi, khādanīyampi sakaṭesu āropetvā bahārāmakoṭṭhake sakaṭaparivaṭṭaṃ karitvā acchanti—“yadā paṭipāṭiṃ labhissāma, tadā bhattaṃ karissāmā”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:33.1.3: Atha kho te manussā yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkamiṃsu, upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavocuṃ—“idha, bhante ānanda, bahuṃ loṇampi, telampi, taṇḍulampi, khādanīyampi sakaṭesu āropitā tiṭṭhanti, mahā ca megho uggato; kathaṃ nu kho, bhante ānanda, paṭipajjitabban”ti?
pli-tv-kd6:33.1.4: Atha kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd6:33.2.1: “Tena hānanda, saṃgho paccantimaṃ vihāraṃ kappiyabhūmiṃ sammannitvā tattha vāsetu, yaṃ saṃgho ākaṅkhati vihāraṃ vā aḍḍhayogaṃ vā pāsādaṃ vā hammiyaṃ vā guhaṃ vā.
pli-tv-kd6:33.2.5: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmaṃ vihāraṃ kappiyabhūmiṃ sammanneyya.
pli-tv-kd6:33.2.9: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa vihārassa kappiyabhūmiyā sammuti, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd6:33.2.12: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:33.3.1: Tena kho pana samayena manussā tattheva sammutiyā kappiyabhūmiyā yāguyo pacanti, bhattāni pacanti, sūpāni sampādenti, maṃsāni koṭṭenti, kaṭṭhāni phālenti.
pli-tv-kd6:33.3.2: Assosi kho bhagavā rattiyā paccūsasamayaṃ paccuṭṭhāya uccāsaddaṃ mahāsaddaṃ kākoravasaddaṃ, sutvāna āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd6:33.3.3: “kiṃ nu kho so, ānanda, uccāsaddo mahāsaddo kākoravasaddo”ti?
pli-tv-kd6:33.4.1: “Etarahi, bhante, manussā tattheva sammutiyā kappiyabhūmiyā yāguyo pacanti, bhattāni pacanti, sūpāni sampādenti, maṃsāni koṭṭenti, kaṭṭhāni phālenti.
pli-tv-kd6:33.4.2: So eso, bhagavā, uccāsaddo mahāsaddo kākoravasaddo”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:33.4.3: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd6:33.5.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā yasojo gilāno hoti.
pli-tv-kd6:34.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhaddiyanagare meṇḍako gahapati paṭivasati.
pli-tv-kd6:34.1.3: sīsaṃ nahāyitvā dhaññāgāraṃ sammajjāpetvā bahidvāre nisīdati, antalikkhā dhaññassa dhārā opatitvā dhaññāgāraṃ pūreti.
pli-tv-kd6:34.1.5: ekaṃyeva āḷhakathālikaṃ upanisīditvā ekañca sūpabhiñjanakaṃ dāsakammakaraporisaṃ bhattena parivisati, na tāva taṃ khiyyati yāva sā na vuṭṭhāti.
pli-tv-kd6:34.1.7: ekaṃyeva sahassathavikaṃ gahetvā dāsakammakaraporisassa chamāsikaṃ vetanaṃ deti, na tāva taṃ khiyyati yāvassa hatthagatā.
pli-tv-kd6:34.2.2: ekaṃyeva catudoṇikaṃ piṭakaṃ upanisīditvā dāsakammakaraporisassa chamāsikaṃ bhattaṃ deti, na tāva taṃ khiyyati yāva sā na vuṭṭhāti.
pli-tv-kd6:34.2.4: ekena naṅgalena kasantassa satta sītāyo gacchanti.
pli-tv-kd6:34.3.1: Assosi kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro—
pli-tv-kd6:34.3.2: “amhākaṃ kira vijite bhaddiyanagare meṇḍako gahapati paṭivasati.
pli-tv-kd6:34.3.4: sīsaṃ nahāyitvā dhaññāgāraṃ sammajjāpetvā bahidvāre nisīdati, antalikkhā dhaññassa dhārā opatitvā dhaññāgāraṃ pūreti.
