pli-tv-kd6:34.3.6: ekaṃyeva āḷhakathālikaṃ upanisīditvā ekañca sūpabhiñjanakaṃ dāsakammakaraporisaṃ bhattena parivisati, na tāva taṃ khiyyati yāva sā na vuṭṭhāti.
pli-tv-kd6:34.3.8: ekaṃyeva sahassathavikaṃ gahetvā dāsakammakaraporisassa chamāsikaṃ vetanaṃ deti, na tāva taṃ khiyyati yāvassa hatthagatā.
pli-tv-kd6:34.4.2: ekaṃyeva catudoṇikaṃ piṭakaṃ upanisīditvā dāsakammakaraporisassa chamāsikaṃ bhattaṃ deti, na tāva taṃ khiyyati yāva sā na vuṭṭhāti.
pli-tv-kd6:34.4.4: ekena naṅgalena kasantassa satta sītāyo gacchantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:34.5.1: Atha kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro aññataraṃ sabbatthakaṃ mahāmattaṃ āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd6:34.5.2: “amhākaṃ kira, bhaṇe, vijite bhaddiyanagare meṇḍako gahapati paṭivasati.
pli-tv-kd6:34.5.4: sīsaṃ nahāyitvā dhaññāgāraṃ sammajjāpetvā bahidvāre nisīdati, antalikkhā dhaññassa dhārā opatitvā dhaññāgāraṃ pūreti.
pli-tv-kd6:34.5.8: dāsassa evarūpo iddhānubhāvo, ekena naṅgalena kasantassa satta sītāyo gacchantīti.
pli-tv-kd6:34.5.10: Yathā mayā sāmaṃ diṭṭho, evaṃ tava diṭṭho bhavissatī”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:34.5.11: “Evaṃ, devā”ti kho so mahāmatto rañño māgadhassa seniyassa bimbisārassa paṭissuṇitvā caturaṅginiyā senāya yena bhaddiyaṃ tena pāyāsi.
pli-tv-kd6:34.6.1: Anupubbena yena bhaddiyaṃ yena meṇḍako gahapati tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā meṇḍakaṃ gahapatiṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd6:34.6.3: ‘amhākaṃ kira, bhaṇe, vijite bhaddiyanagare meṇḍako gahapati paṭivasati, tassa evarūpo iddhānubhāvo, sīsaṃ nahāyitvā …pe…
pli-tv-kd6:34.6.7: dāsassa evarūpo iddhānubhāvo, ekena naṅgalena kasantassa satta sītāyo gacchantīti, gaccha, bhaṇe, jānāhi.
pli-tv-kd6:34.6.8: Yathā mayā sāmaṃ diṭṭho, evaṃ tava diṭṭho bhavissatī’ti.
pli-tv-kd6:34.6.10: Atha kho meṇḍako gahapati sīsaṃ nahāyitvā dhaññāgāraṃ sammajjāpetvā bahidvāre nisīdi, antalikkhā dhaññassa dhārā opatitvā dhaññāgāraṃ pūresi.
pli-tv-kd6:34.7.1: Atha kho meṇḍako gahapati bhariyaṃ āṇāpesi—
pli-tv-kd6:34.7.3: Atha kho meṇḍakassa gahapatissa bhariyā ekaṃyeva āḷhakathālikaṃ upanisīditvā ekañca sūpabhiñjanakaṃ caturaṅginiṃ senaṃ bhattena parivisi, na tāva taṃ khiyyati, yāva sā na vuṭṭhāti.
pli-tv-kd6:34.8.1: Atha kho meṇḍako gahapati puttaṃ āṇāpesi—
pli-tv-kd6:34.8.2: “tena hi caturaṅginiyā senāya chamāsikaṃ vetanaṃ dehī”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:34.8.3: Atha kho meṇḍakassa gahapatissa putto ekaṃyeva sahassathavikaṃ gahetvā caturaṅginiyā senāya chamāsikaṃ vetanaṃ adāsi, na tāva taṃ khiyyati, yāvassa hatthagatā.
pli-tv-kd6:34.9.1: Atha kho meṇḍako gahapati suṇisaṃ āṇāpesi—
pli-tv-kd6:34.9.2: “tena hi caturaṅginiyā senāya chamāsikaṃ bhattaṃ dehī”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:34.9.3: Atha kho meṇḍakassa gahapatissa suṇisā ekaṃyeva catudoṇikaṃ piṭakaṃ upanisīditvā caturaṅginiyā senāya chamāsikaṃ bhattaṃ adāsi, na tāva taṃ khiyyati yāva sā na vuṭṭhāti.
pli-tv-kd6:34.9.6: “Mayhaṃ kho, sāmi, dāsassa iddhānubhāvo khette passitabbo”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:34.9.8: Atha kho so mahāmatto caturaṅginiyā senāya punadeva rājagahaṃ paccāgañchi.
pli-tv-kd6:34.9.9: Yena rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā rañño māgadhassa seniyassa bimbisārassa etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd6:34.10.1: Atha kho bhagavā vesāliyaṃ yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā yena bhaddiyaṃ tena cārikaṃ pakkāmi mahatā bhikkhusaṃghena saddhiṃ aḍḍhatelasehi bhikkhusatehi.
pli-tv-kd6:34.10.2: Atha kho bhagavā anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno yena bhaddiyaṃ tadavasari.
pli-tv-kd6:34.10.3: Tatra sudaṃ bhagavā bhaddiye viharati jātiyā vane.
pli-tv-kd6:34.11.2: “samaṇo khalu bho gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulā pabbajito bhaddiyaṃ anuppatto bhaddiye viharati jātiyā vane.
pli-tv-kd6:34.11.3: Taṃ kho pana bhagavantaṃ gotamaṃ evaṃ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato—
pli-tv-kd6:34.11.4: ‘itipi so bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavā’.
pli-tv-kd6:34.11.5: So imaṃ lokaṃ sadevakaṃ samārakaṃ sabrahmakaṃ sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiṃ pajaṃ sadevamanussaṃ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedeti.
pli-tv-kd6:34.11.6: So dhammaṃ deseti ādikalyāṇaṃ majjhekalyāṇaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ pakāseti.
pli-tv-kd6:34.11.7: Sādhu kho pana tathārūpānaṃ arahataṃ dassanaṃ hotī”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:34.12.1: Atha kho meṇḍako gahapati bhadrāni bhadrāni yānāni yojāpetvā bhadraṃ bhadraṃ yānaṃ abhiruhitvā bhadrehi bhadrehi yānehi bhaddiyā niyyāsi bhagavantaṃ dassanāya.
pli-tv-kd6:34.12.2: Addasaṃsu kho sambahulā titthiyā meṇḍakaṃ gahapatiṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ, disvāna meṇḍakaṃ gahapatiṃ etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-kd6:34.12.5: “Kiṃ pana tvaṃ, gahapati, kiriyavādo samāno akiriyavādaṃ samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamissasi?
pli-tv-kd6:34.12.6: Samaṇo hi, gahapati, gotamo akiriyavādo akiriyāya dhammaṃ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetī”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:34.13.2: “nissaṃsayaṃ kho so bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho bhavissati, yathayime titthiyā usūyantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:34.13.3: Yāvatikā yānassa bhūmi, yānena gantvā yānā paccorohitvā pattikova yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd6:34.13.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinnassa kho meṇḍakassa gahapatissa bhagavā anupubbiṃ kathaṃ kathesi, seyyathidaṃ—
pli-tv-kd6:34.13.8: upāsakaṃ maṃ bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gataṃ.
pli-tv-kd6:34.13.9: Adhivāsetu ca me, bhante, bhagavā svātanāya bhattaṃ saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṃghenā”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:34.14.1: Atha kho meṇḍako gahapati bhagavato adhivāsanaṃ viditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd6:34.14.2: Atha kho meṇḍako gahapati tassā rattiyā accayena paṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ paṭiyādāpetvā bhagavato kālaṃ ārocāpesi—“kālo, bhante, niṭṭhitaṃ bhattan”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:34.14.3: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena meṇḍakassa gahapatissa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṃghena.
pli-tv-kd6:34.15.1: Atha kho meṇḍakassa gahapatissa bhariyā ca putto ca suṇisā ca dāso ca yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
pli-tv-kd6:34.15.2: Tesaṃ bhagavā anupubbiṃ kathaṃ kathesi, seyyathidaṃ—
pli-tv-kd6:34.15.6: ete mayaṃ, bhante, bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāma dhammañca bhikkhusaṃghañca.
pli-tv-kd6:34.15.7: Upāsake no bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupete saraṇaṃ gate”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:34.16.1: Atha kho meṇḍako gahapati buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṃghaṃ paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappetvā sampavāretvā bhagavantaṃ bhuttāviṃ onītapattapāṇiṃ ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho meṇḍako gahapati bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd6:34.16.2: “yāva, bhante, bhagavā bhaddiye viharati tāva ahaṃ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṃghassa dhuvabhattenā”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:34.16.3: Atha kho bhagavā meṇḍakaṃ gahapatiṃ dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṃsetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd6:34.17.1: Atha kho bhagavā bhaddiye yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā meṇḍakaṃ gahapatiṃ anāpucchā yena aṅguttarāpo tena cārikaṃ pakkāmi mahatā bhikkhusaṃghena saddhiṃ aḍḍhatelasehi bhikkhusatehi.
pli-tv-kd6:34.17.3: “bhagavā kira yena aṅguttarāpo tena cārikaṃ pakkanto mahatā bhikkhusaṃghena saddhiṃ aḍḍhatelasehi bhikkhusatehī”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:34.17.4: Atha kho meṇḍako gahapati dāse ca kammakare ca āṇāpesi—
pli-tv-kd6:34.17.5: “tena hi, bhaṇe, bahuṃ loṇampi, telampi, taṇḍulampi, khādanīyampi sakaṭesu āropetvā āgacchatha, aḍḍhatelasāni ca gopālakasatāni aḍḍhatelasāni ca dhenusatāni ādāya āgacchantu, yattha bhagavantaṃ passissāma tattha taruṇena khīrena bhojessāmā”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:34.18.1: Atha kho meṇḍako gahapati bhagavantaṃ antarāmagge kantāre sambhāvesi.
pli-tv-kd6:34.18.2: Atha kho meṇḍako gahapati yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
pli-tv-kd6:34.18.3: Ekamantaṃ ṭhito kho meṇḍako gahapati bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd6:34.18.4: “adhivāsetu me, bhante, bhagavā svātanāya bhattaṃ saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṃghenā”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:34.18.6: Atha kho meṇḍako gahapati bhagavato adhivāsanaṃ viditvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd6:34.18.7: Atha kho meṇḍako gahapati tassā rattiyā accayena paṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ paṭiyādāpetvā bhagavato kālaṃ ārocāpesi—“kālo, bhante, niṭṭhitaṃ bhattan”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:34.19.1: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena meṇḍakassa gahapatissa parivesanā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṃghena.
pli-tv-kd6:34.19.2: Atha kho meṇḍako gahapati aḍḍhatelasāni gopālakasatāni āṇāpesi—
pli-tv-kd6:34.19.3: “tena hi, bhaṇe, ekamekaṃ dhenuṃ gahetvā ekamekassa bhikkhuno upatiṭṭhatha taruṇena khīrena bhojessāmā”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:34.19.4: Atha kho meṇḍako gahapati buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṃghaṃ paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappesi sampavāresi, taruṇena ca khīrena.
pli-tv-kd6:34.20.1: Atha kho meṇḍako gahapati buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṃghaṃ paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappetvā sampavāretvā taruṇena ca khīrena bhagavantaṃ bhuttāviṃ onītapattapāṇiṃ ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd6:34.20.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho meṇḍako gahapati bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd6:34.20.3: “santi, bhante, maggā kantārā, appodakā appabhakkhā, na sukarā apātheyyena gantuṃ.
pli-tv-kd6:34.20.4: Sādhu, bhante, bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ pātheyyaṃ anujānātū”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:34.20.5: Atha kho bhagavā meṇḍakaṃ gahapatiṃ dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṃsetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd6:34.21.1: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd6:34.21.4: Santi, bhikkhave, maggā kantārā appodakā appabhakkhā, na sukarā apātheyyena gantuṃ.
pli-tv-kd6:34.21.5: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pātheyyaṃ pariyesituṃ taṇḍulo taṇḍulatthikena, muggo muggatthikena, māso māsatthikena, loṇaṃ loṇatthikena, guḷo guḷatthikena, telaṃ telatthikena, sappi sappitthikena.
pli-tv-kd6:34.21.6: Santi, bhikkhave, manussā, saddhā pasannā, te kappiyakārakānaṃ hatthe hiraññaṃ upanikkhipanti—
pli-tv-kd6:34.21.8: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, yaṃ tato kappiyaṃ taṃ sādituṃ;
pli-tv-kd6:34.21.9: na tvevāhaṃ, bhikkhave, kenaci pariyāyena jātarūparajataṃ sāditabbaṃ pariyesitabbanti vadāmī”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:35.1.1: Atha kho bhagavā anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno yena āpaṇaṃ tadavasari.
pli-tv-kd6:35.1.3: “samaṇo khalu bho gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulā pabbajito āpaṇaṃ anuppatto, taṃ kho pana bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ evaṃ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato …pe…
pli-tv-kd6:35.1.4: sādhu kho pana tathārūpānaṃ arahataṃ dassanaṃ hotī”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:35.1.6: “kiṃ nu kho ahaṃ samaṇassa gotamassa harāpeyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:35.2.2: “yepi kho te brāhmaṇānaṃ pubbakā isayo mantānaṃ kattāro mantānaṃ pavattāro, yesamidaṃ etarahi brāhmaṇā porāṇaṃ mantapadaṃ gītaṃ pavuttaṃ samihitaṃ, tadanugāyanti tadanubhāsanti, bhāsitamanubhāsanti, vācitamanuvācenti, seyyathidaṃ—
pli-tv-kd6:35.2.3: aṭṭhako vāmako vāmadevo vessāmitto yamataggi aṅgīraso bhāradvājo vāseṭṭho kassapo bhagu, rattūparatā viratā vikālabhojanā, te evarūpāni pānāni sādiyiṃsu.
pli-tv-kd6:35.3.1: Samaṇopi gotamo rattūparato virato vikālabhojanā, arahati samaṇopi gotamo evarūpāni pānāni sādiyitun”ti
pli-tv-kd6:35.3.2: pahūtaṃ pānaṃ paṭiyādāpetvā kājehi gāhāpetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodi;
pli-tv-kd6:35.3.3: sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
pli-tv-kd6:35.3.4: Ekamantaṃ ṭhito kho keṇiyo jaṭilo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd6:35.3.7: Atha kho keṇiyo jaṭilo bhikkhūnaṃ deti.
pli-tv-kd6:35.4.1: Atha kho keṇiyo jaṭilo buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṃghaṃ pahūtehi pānehi sahatthā santappetvā sampavāretvā bhagavantaṃ dhotahatthaṃ onītapattapāṇiṃ ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd6:35.4.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho keṇiyaṃ jaṭilaṃ bhagavā dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṃsesi.
pli-tv-kd6:35.4.3: Atha kho keṇiyo jaṭilo bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito samuttejito sampahaṃsito bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd6:35.4.4: “adhivāsetu me bhavaṃ gotamo svātanāya bhattaṃ saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṃghenā”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:35.5.1: “Mahā kho, keṇiya, bhikkhusaṃgho aḍḍhatelasāni bhikkhusatāni, tvañca brāhmaṇesu abhippasanno”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:35.5.2: Dutiyampi kho keṇiyo jaṭilo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd6:35.5.3: “kiñcāpi kho, bho gotama, mahā bhikkhusaṃgho aḍḍhatelasāni bhikkhusatāni, ahañca brāhmaṇesu abhippasanno, adhivāsetu me bhavaṃ gotamo svātanāya bhattaṃ saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṃghenā”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:35.5.4: “Mahā kho, keṇiya, bhikkhusaṃgho aḍḍhatelasāni bhikkhusatāni, tvañca brāhmaṇesu abhippasanno”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:35.5.5: Tatiyampi kho keṇiyo jaṭilo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd6:35.5.6: “kiñcāpi kho, bho gotama, mahā bhikkhusaṃgho aḍḍhatelasāni bhikkhusatāni, ahañca brāhmaṇesu abhippasanno, adhivāsetu bhavaṃ gotamo svātanāya bhattaṃ saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṃghenā”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:35.5.8: Atha kho keṇiyo jaṭilo bhagavato adhivāsanaṃ viditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd6:35.6.1: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd6:35.6.3: ambapānaṃ jambupānaṃ cocapānaṃ mocapānaṃ madhūkapānaṃ muddikapānaṃ sālūkapānaṃ phārusakapānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd6:35.6.4: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, sabbaṃ phalarasaṃ ṭhapetvā dhaññaphalarasaṃ.
pli-tv-kd6:35.6.5: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, sabbaṃ pattarasaṃ ṭhapetvā ḍākarasaṃ.
pli-tv-kd6:35.6.6: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, sabbaṃ puppharasaṃ ṭhapetvā madhūkapuppharasaṃ.
pli-tv-kd6:35.7.1: Atha kho keṇiyo jaṭilo tassā rattiyā accayena sake assame paṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ paṭiyādāpetvā bhagavato kālaṃ ārocāpesi—“kālo, bho gotama, niṭṭhitaṃ bhattan”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:35.7.2: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena keṇiyassa jaṭilassa assamo tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṃghena.
pli-tv-kd6:35.7.3: Atha kho keṇiyo jaṭilo buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṃghaṃ paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappetvā sampavāretvā bhagavantaṃ bhuttāviṃ onītapattapāṇiṃ ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd6:35.8.1: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho keṇiyaṃ jaṭilaṃ bhagavā imāhi gāthāhi anumodi—
pli-tv-kd6:35.8.10: Atha kho bhagavā keṇiyaṃ jaṭilaṃ imāhi gāthāhi anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd6:36.1.1: Atha kho bhagavā āpaṇe yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā yena kusinārā tena cārikaṃ pakkāmi mahatā bhikkhusaṃghena saddhiṃ aḍḍhatelasehi bhikkhusatehi.
pli-tv-kd6:36.1.2: Assosuṃ kho kosinārakā mallā—“bhagavā kira kusināraṃ āgacchati mahatā bhikkhusaṃghena saddhiṃ aḍḍhatelasehi bhikkhusatehī”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:36.1.3: Te saṅgaraṃ akaṃsu—“yo bhagavato paccuggamanaṃ na karissati, pañcasatānissa daṇḍo”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:36.1.4: Tena kho pana samayena rojo mallo āyasmato ānandassa sahāyo hoti.
pli-tv-kd6:36.1.5: Atha kho bhagavā anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno yena kusinārā tadavasari.
pli-tv-kd6:36.2.1: Atha kho kosinārakā mallā bhagavato paccuggamanaṃ akaṃsu.
pli-tv-kd6:36.2.2: Atha kho rojo mallo bhagavato paccuggamanaṃ karitvā yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
pli-tv-kd6:36.2.3: Ekamantaṃ ṭhitaṃ kho rojaṃ mallaṃ āyasmā ānando etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd6:36.2.4: “uḷāraṃ kho te idaṃ, āvuso roja, yaṃ tvaṃ bhagavato paccuggamanaṃ akāsī”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:36.2.5: “Nāhaṃ, bhante ānanda, bahukato buddhe vā dhamme vā saṃghe vā;
pli-tv-kd6:36.2.6: api ca ñātīhi saṅgaro kato—‘yo bhagavato paccuggamanaṃ na karissati, pañcasatānissa daṇḍo’ti;
pli-tv-kd6:36.2.7: so kho ahaṃ, bhante ānanda, ñātīnaṃ daṇḍabhayā evāhaṃ bhagavato paccuggamanaṃ akāsin”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:36.2.8: Atha kho āyasmā ānando anattamano ahosi “kathañhi nāma rojo mallo evaṃ vakkhatī”ti?
pli-tv-kd6:36.3.1: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd6:36.3.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd6:36.3.4: Mahatthiko kho pana evarūpānaṃ ñātamanussānaṃ imasmiṃ dhammavinaye pasādo.
pli-tv-kd6:36.3.5: Sādhu, bhante, bhagavā tathā karotu, yathā rojo mallo imasmiṃ dhammavinaye pasīdeyyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:36.3.6: “Na kho taṃ, ānanda, dukkaraṃ tathāgatena, yathā rojo mallo imasmiṃ dhammavinaye pasīdeyyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:36.4.1: Atha kho bhagavā rojaṃ mallaṃ mettena cittena pharitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ pāvisi.
pli-tv-kd6:36.4.2: Atha kho rojo mallo bhagavato mettena cittena phuṭṭho, seyyathāpi nāma gāviṃ taruṇavaccho;
pli-tv-kd6:36.4.3: evameva vihārena vihāraṃ pariveṇena pariveṇaṃ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhū pucchati—
pli-tv-kd6:36.4.4: “kahaṃ nu kho, bhante, etarahi so bhagavā viharati arahaṃ sammāsambuddho, dassanakāmā hi mayaṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ arahantaṃ sammāsambuddhan”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:36.4.5: “Esāvuso roja, vihāro saṃvutadvāro, tena appasaddo upasaṅkamitvā ataramāno āḷindaṃ pavisitvā ukkāsitvā aggaḷaṃ ākoṭehi, vivarissati te bhagavā dvāran”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:36.5.1: Atha kho rojo mallo yena so vihāro saṃvutadvāro, tena appasaddo upasaṅkamitvā ataramāno āḷindaṃ pavisitvā ukkāsitvā aggaḷaṃ ākoṭesi. Vivari bhagavā dvāraṃ.
pli-tv-kd6:36.5.2: Atha kho rojo mallo vihāraṃ pavisitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd6:36.5.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinnassa kho rojassa mallassa bhagavā anupubbiṃ kathaṃ kathesi, seyyathidaṃ—
pli-tv-kd6:36.5.6: “sādhu, bhante, ayyā mamaññeva paṭiggaṇheyyuṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṃ, no aññesan”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:36.5.7: “Yesaṃ kho, roja, sekkhena ñāṇena sekkhena dassanena dhammo diṭṭho seyyathāpi tayā, tesampi evaṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd6:36.5.8: ‘aho nūna ayyā amhākaññeva paṭiggaṇheyyuṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṃ, no aññesan’ti.
pli-tv-kd6:36.5.9: Tena hi, roja, tava ceva paṭiggahissanti aññesañcā”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:36.6.1: Tena kho pana samayena kusinārāyaṃ paṇītānaṃ bhattānaṃ bhattapaṭipāṭi aṭṭhitā hoti.
pli-tv-kd6:36.6.2: Atha kho rojassa mallassa paṭipāṭiṃ alabhantassa etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd6:36.6.3: “yannūnāhaṃ bhattaggaṃ olokeyyaṃ, yaṃ bhattagge nāssa, taṃ paṭiyādeyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:36.6.4: Atha kho rojo mallo bhattaggaṃ olokento dve nāddasa—
pli-tv-kd6:36.6.6: Atha kho rojo mallo yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd6:36.6.7: “idha me, bhante ānanda, paṭipāṭiṃ alabhantassa etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd6:36.6.8: ‘yannūnāhaṃ bhattaggaṃ olokeyyaṃ, yaṃ bhattagge nāssa, taṃ paṭiyādeyyan’ti.
pli-tv-kd6:36.6.9: So kho ahaṃ, bhante ānanda, bhattaggaṃ olokento dve nāddasaṃ—
pli-tv-kd6:36.6.11: Sacāhaṃ, bhante ānanda, paṭiyādeyyaṃ ḍākañca piṭṭhakhādanīyañca, paṭiggaṇheyya me bhagavā”ti?
pli-tv-kd6:36.7.1: Atha kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd6:36.7.4: Atha kho rojo mallo tassā rattiyā accayena pahūtaṃ ḍākañca piṭṭhakhādanīyañca paṭiyādāpetvā bhagavato upanāmesi—
pli-tv-kd6:36.7.7: Atha kho rojo mallo bhikkhūnaṃ deti.
pli-tv-kd6:36.8.1: Atha kho rojo mallo buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṃghaṃ pahūtehi ḍākehi ca piṭṭhakhādanīyehi ca sahatthā santappetvā sampavāretvā bhagavantaṃ dhotahatthaṃ onītapattapāṇiṃ ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd6:36.8.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho rojaṃ mallaṃ bhagavā dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṃsetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd6:36.8.3: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd6:37.1.1: Atha kho bhagavā kusinārāyaṃ yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā yena ātumā tena cārikaṃ pakkāmi mahatā bhikkhusaṃghena saddhiṃ aḍḍhatelasehi bhikkhusatehi.
pli-tv-kd6:37.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro vuḍḍhapabbajito ātumāyaṃ paṭivasati nahāpitapubbo.
pli-tv-kd6:37.1.3: Tassa dve dārakā honti, mañjukā paṭibhāneyyakā, dakkhā pariyodātasippā sake ācariyake nahāpitakamme.
pli-tv-kd6:37.2.1: Assosi kho so vuḍḍhapabbajito—“bhagavā kira ātumaṃ āgacchati mahatā bhikkhusaṃghena saddhiṃ aḍḍhatelasehi bhikkhusatehī”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:37.2.2: Atha kho so vuḍḍhapabbajito te dārake etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd6:37.2.3: “bhagavā kira, tātā, ātumaṃ āgacchati mahatā bhikkhusaṃghena saddhiṃ aḍḍhatelasehi bhikkhusatehi.
pli-tv-kd6:37.2.4: Gacchatha tumhe, tātā, khurabhaṇḍaṃ ādāya nāḷiyāvāpakena anugharakaṃ anugharakaṃ āhiṇḍatha, loṇampi, telampi, taṇḍulampi, khādanīyampi saṃharatha, bhagavato āgatassa yāgupānaṃ karissāmā”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:37.3.1: “Evaṃ, tātā”ti kho te dārakā tassa vuḍḍhapabbajitassa paṭissuṇitvā khurabhaṇḍaṃ ādāya nāḷiyāvāpakena anugharakaṃ anugharakaṃ āhiṇḍanti, loṇampi, telampi, taṇḍulampi, khādanīyampi saṃharantā.
pli-tv-kd6:37.3.2: Manussā te dārake mañjuke paṭibhāneyyake passitvā yepi na kārāpetukāmā tepi kārāpenti, kārāpetvāpi bahuṃ denti.
pli-tv-kd6:37.3.3: Atha kho te dārakā bahuṃ loṇampi, telampi, taṇḍulampi, khādanīyampi saṃhariṃsu.
pli-tv-kd6:37.4.1: Atha kho bhagavā anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno yena ātumā tadavasari.
pli-tv-kd6:37.4.2: Tatra sudaṃ bhagavā ātumāyaṃ viharati bhusāgāre.
pli-tv-kd6:37.4.3: Atha kho so vuḍḍhapabbajito tassā rattiyā accayena pahūtaṃ yāguṃ paṭiyādāpetvā bhagavato upanāmesi—
pli-tv-kd6:37.4.7: Atha kho bhagavā taṃ vuḍḍhapabbajitaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd6:37.4.9: Atha kho so vuḍḍhapabbajito bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd6:37.5.2: “ananucchavikaṃ, moghapurisa, ananulomikaṃ appatirūpaṃ assāmaṇakaṃ akappiyaṃ akaraṇīyaṃ.
pli-tv-kd6:37.5.3: Kathañhi nāma tvaṃ, moghapurisa, pabbajito akappiye samādapessasi.
pli-tv-kd6:37.5.5: vigarahitvā dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd6:37.5.6: “na, bhikkhave, pabbajitena akappiye samādapetabbaṃ, yo samādapeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-kd6:37.5.7: Na ca, bhikkhave, nahāpitapubbena khurabhaṇḍaṃ pariharitabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd6:38.1.1: Atha kho bhagavā ātumāyaṃ yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā yena sāvatthi tena cārikaṃ pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd6:38.1.2: Anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno yena sāvatthi tadavasari.
pli-tv-kd6:38.1.3: Tatra sudaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-kd6:38.1.4: Tena kho pana samayena sāvatthiyaṃ bahuṃ phalakhādanīyaṃ uppannaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-kd6:38.1.6: “kiṃ nu kho bhagavatā phalakhādanīyaṃ anuññātaṃ, kiṃ ananuññātan”ti?
pli-tv-kd6:39.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena saṃghikāni bījāni puggalikāya bhūmiyā ropiyanti, puggalikāni bījāni saṃghikāya bhūmiyā ropiyanti.
pli-tv-kd6:39.1.3: “Saṃghikāni, bhikkhave, bījāni puggalikāya bhūmiyā ropitāni bhāgaṃ datvā paribhuñjitabbāni.
pli-tv-kd6:39.1.4: Puggalikāni bījāni saṃghikāya bhūmiyā ropitāni bhāgaṃ datvā paribhuñjitabbānī”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:40.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhūnaṃ kismiñci kismiñci ṭhāne kukkuccaṃ uppajjati—
pli-tv-kd6:40.1.2: “kiṃ nu kho bhagavatā anuññātaṃ, kiṃ ananuññātan”ti?
pli-tv-kd6:40.1.4: “Yaṃ, bhikkhave, mayā ‘idaṃ na kappatī’ti appaṭikkhittaṃ tañce akappiyaṃ anulometi, kappiyaṃ paṭibāhati, taṃ vo na kappati.
pli-tv-kd6:40.1.5: Yaṃ, bhikkhave, mayā ‘idaṃ na kappatī’ti appaṭikkhittaṃ tañce kappiyaṃ anulometi, akappiyaṃ paṭibāhati, taṃ vo kappati.
pli-tv-kd6:40.1.6: Yaṃ, bhikkhave, mayā ‘idaṃ kappatī’ti ananuññātaṃ tañce akappiyaṃ anulometi, kappiyaṃ paṭibāhati, taṃ vo na kappati.
pli-tv-kd6:40.1.7: Yaṃ, bhikkhave, mayā ‘idaṃ kappatī’ti ananuññātaṃ, tañce kappiyaṃ anulometi, akappiyaṃ paṭibāhati, taṃ vo kappatī”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:40.2.2: “kappati nu kho yāvakālikena yāmakālikaṃ, na nu kho kappati?
pli-tv-kd6:40.2.3: Kappati nu kho yāvakālikena sattāhakālikaṃ, na nu kho kappati?
pli-tv-kd6:40.2.4: Kappati nu kho yāvakālikena yāvajīvikaṃ, na nu kho kappati?
pli-tv-kd6:40.2.5: Kappati nu kho yāmakālikena sattāhakālikaṃ, na nu kho kappati?
pli-tv-kd6:40.2.6: Kappati nu kho yāmakālikena yāvajīvikaṃ, na nu kho kappati?
pli-tv-kd6:40.2.7: Kappati nu kho sattāhakālikena yāvajīvikaṃ, na nu kho kappatī”ti?
pli-tv-kd6:40.3.1: “Yāvakālikena, bhikkhave, yāmakālikaṃ, tadahu paṭiggahitaṃ kāle kappati, vikāle na kappati.
pli-tv-kd6:40.3.2: Yāvakālikena, bhikkhave, sattāhakālikaṃ, tadahu paṭiggahitaṃ kāle kappati, vikāle na kappati.
pli-tv-kd6:40.3.3: Yāvakālikena, bhikkhave, yāvajīvikaṃ, tadahu paṭiggahitaṃ kāle kappati, vikāle na kappati.
pli-tv-kd6:40.3.4: Yāmakālikena, bhikkhave, sattāhakālikaṃ, tadahu paṭiggahitaṃ yāme kappati, yāmātikkante na kappati.
pli-tv-kd6:40.3.5: Yāmakālikena, bhikkhave, yāvajīvikaṃ, tadahu paṭiggahitaṃ yāme kappati, yāmātikkante na kappati.
pli-tv-kd6:40.3.6: Sattāhakālikena, bhikkhave, yāvajīvikaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ, sattāhaṃ kappati, sattāhātikkante na kappatī”ti.
